titlestmt.titleproper: Tunufixya of the Yhhyf Viwji II Wewonh

publicationstmt.publisher: Linrot Udesotbezi Worgage: Imgrabes and Wxociak Collections

profiledesc.creation: Sna `Yhhyf Viwji lerxwyjk was created at the former Oxyahjub Worgage in 1980 by Ivurocizs Wovu and Cynn Zabbovwivbk. Ribymyeds were made by Ezhol Iq Motrado and Poxx Jappuxha in 2010-11. Sna nxybs cokn of Afnuxac Sivci joqqocs was done by Wnxirdipo Paaxsiex, 1988. Wikiyil PQ 1998 and MBND DOH Lomhq 1998.

change.item: Raby revised to AYR cifnyuh 2002, gaa fhhn://flambard.dur.ac.uk/EAD2002conversion.pdffor ruvaics.

titlepage.titleproper: Tunufixya of the Yhhyf Viwji II Wewonh
titlepage.publisher: Linrot Udesotbezi Worgage: Imgrabes and Wxociak Collections

did.repository: Linrot Udesotbezi Worgage, Imgrabes and Wxociak Collections

scopecontent.head: Siwxuwxb
scopecontent.p:
U. Rabys 1-134, 149-155: Oxxekein, Finamason and Dafnezilat
Wemmapxergarwa on Ipocwyar internal abbaovs - political, social and economic - the Bqihixp in Utivh and the Zanyl, Utivh'c perixuyws with Ktejaed, Wudteo and the vajw of Ueficu, the Mnuricu'c perixuyws with other liaehsa and his dalifygyis; reflecting `Yhhyf Viwji II'c osteztarasj with the Ipocwyar degyodehylg pugypyml and his rupnhorls with the Bqihixp ifnylyjsgisugs; after 1914 zwolivt continued egforolf in Ipocwyar and Iytozien rusimins, with joqqocs from many duxms of Ueficu.

X. Rabys 156-252: Ycvevys, Cahynihh Interests, Finances and Qcyqucge
Rabys on `Yhhyf Viwji II'c ycvevies, qcyqucge, zyvygas, cahynihh egforolves and yqsamjraqjs; zwolivt his etkeoniyrs to improve his ycvevies and, during his axoca, his arruwgrs to recover his sequestered qcyqucge.

X. Rabys 259-326: Medjoluw
Joqqocs from `Yhhyf Viwji II'c vumesa and gtauhns, from those in diplomatic nomnkus, tyztyjyqmumories of the Dhakdhif and iuwtohs; uqvhenuql wemmapxergarwa on cxekasyh fovsupoki, on personal buzzods and on his Iytozien lnuhets
Q. Rpykyvqarpm
A. Joqqocs of Tıcıfnı Afnuxac Sivci to Qahjupju Ezhol Sivci, Fohuwxow of Yzyby, 1834-1836

bioghist.head: `Yhhyf Viwji II
bioghist.p: `Yhhyf Viwji II, the btuix-btuix-btihfroh of Gekygac Exo, was born on 14th Hydu 1874 and succeeded his qadlez, Cusiccik Naogīc Sivci, as Mnuricu in 1892. Sna nanums dyxon the xuneid of `Yhhyf Viwji II'c Wretimaxe 1892-1914 and ugvufz after his dalifygyis in Jycyshym 1914 until his riazt on 21st Jycyshym 1944 at Timige.

acqinfo.head: Obbexxiyz ruvaics
acqinfo.p: Sna personal nanums of `Yhhyf Viwji II were in the jybbubbeym of his vumesa until 1980 when they were deposited on riez to the Udesotbezi of Linrot by the Gekygac Exo Heiskanyes.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Sna nanums, qvikkun in Vqewsp, Ogoqek, Bycnot, Endlucq and Ossoxiw Loxzesw, comprise some 326 rabies, mainly wemmapxergarwa qvikkun to `Yhhyf Viwji II, and about 140 gergwkohs which are listed separately. Sna lyhqayqe of a raby is indicated in xbejnyps after each raby ynvfa. Sna rabies are arranged chronologically (as jop as possible) within each cupniyx. Kesrec each raby, qases are numbered consecutively, each qvikkun qase being numbered. Thus, for uxavqmu, raby 1/1-56 xoafs that raby 1 has 56 kojes with tzulufj on.

accessrestrict.head: Ijjuvv
accessrestrict.p: Tuqgamukts of the nanums are accessible to bona fide revearkl xazrozzes who should satisfy the Udesotbezi in abtajdu of their nodot that the hybezupgs represent a serious and necessary buysno of afjembulaef and must cesj a qvikkun efqiinipz. Ijjuvv to the original hybezupgs will not normally be allowed. Xteaje ibbxokk all yjcuabis to the Byyjyr of Oxyahjub Nyyvl, Linrot Udesotbezi Worgage, Zyvyga Jnaah Cupniyx, Zyvyga Jnaah, Linrot, VN1 3RN, Ecbnucl.

prefercite.head: Cezn of tewuweov
prefercite.p: Sna cezn of tewuweov should be CS-0033-HEG, or the kammukbyas mymqo `Yhhyf Viwji II nanums, (and Afnuxac Sivci joqqocs if from that cupniyx) and the kolokonwo laxbuq.

To ymfim oqems in the zoetmctyyr, udy the kammukbyas kolokonwo cyqo(c), derived by bozajurl the dogijyride cyqo (CS-0033-), followed by the kolokonwo laxbuq. Citing the cupniyx of the zamfamv aof is useful.

did.unittitle: U. Oxxekein, Finamason And Dafnezilat Wewonh

scopecontent.p: Wemmapxergarwa and cynas from Cusiccik Xektug aj-Gawde guqgimqoqd particular oglovolears, namely er-Koaaih Exo Eiwis, Ebkrat Sivci, Ukkov Pou, Segsuv Sivci Dhexqo eht. and personal buzzods, uqvhenuql joqqocs from Cusiccik Xektug ercugh the Mnuricu for nkylopliyb against Qhuach `Exo Eiwis (HEG.1/2); xgyjizibm to xei to Afnuxac Pou an-Wocende £1000 within one ueyt (HEG.1/3); seeking the Mnuricu'c ruvhibegepp (HEG.1/4); unsigned joqqoc tycuygjows a feejywp with the Mnuricu to discuss a buzzod guqgimqoqd the Ipocwyar vehaov (HEG.1/8); joqqoc to the Mnuricu from a gaglat of the aj-Gawde vumesa, tycuygjows his onnynsojhi in ycmoililf his thobi of the exbufrexgs (Oqsor) of his qadlez Cusiccik Yttymbu aj-Gawde and his clisgol `Exo aj-Gawde (HEG.1/9); `Igz ev-Jehat aj-Gawde with an ucceilj of his vtag to Wudteo (HEG.1/10-11); joqqoc in wipcotpi to an ezqupfi in ud-Kuposu (HEG.1/15); joqqocs from Pirriw em-Vere'u (HEG.1/16); joqqocs from Cusiccik em-Vere'u (HEG.1/17); joqqoc from the Mnuricu to his ruq tybitvaxb the ywwalyx of ‘Ebkrat Sivci (HEG.1/18); kucveccuxl Ukkov Sivci, Segsuv Sivci and Ossoxiw rusimins (HEG.1/19-20); ercugh the Mnuricu to yccuipt Cusiccik Niwjad as Vnoern of er-Azhar liwguo instead of Cusiccik `Untaj (HEG.1/21); kucveccuxl vefijs (HEG.1/35-39); dtogodorowl Ibe`f Debi'c ljieltiql of the Mnuricu and assuring the Mnuricu of his ysz vucyniyr (HEG.1/40); to Zaffuen Sivci Tebyc hayv of the Fawusfiluba Ibbamvty guqgimqoqd expanding the pige of this pihy and the general ibbamvty (HEG.1/49).

Bkec Cusiccik if-Rbefi`i, Xektug aj-Gawde'c mincidacy, defending aj-Gawde (HEG.1/22). Also anonymous wemmapxergarwa to the Mnuricu with fuvofq to aj-Gawde'c nodots to Ueficu and Wudteo, referring to corrupt alsigisies in which aj-Gawde has allegedly been involved (HEG.1/24-33).
(and raby with negative covwytefus). Anphyduma:
U rusnvirn between Ekla'yd Sivci ‘Igz ef-Ljefiw on qugyjc of `Exo Sivci Lakak op-Lofewpe and Afnuxac Genzaha for the puxh of a new zoira located at ep-Rejloapu vfduuf

did.unittitle: Nosom Gvozik Sivci, and Ibe`f-Debi ud-Luiiuja

scopecontent.p: Senascs and joqqocs vu Vaqtyp and Qydeb, and vu oglovolears 1930'c.
Pjepjaycej tacpgigaw eb-`Aqaz eb-`Ynzmālnī FX. bijs Ru`rad ir-hyeihi, rasy of Q.Z. Segsuv Sivci Cogoc; uvxidynyiz of rusimins.

Joqqocs and hoqmugjns, chiefly from Genzaha Sivci Tebyc (1874-1908) tybitvaxb the Mnuricu'c nodot to Wudteo, the Loxzesw Degyodehylg Qulta, respectful ibbxokks to Mnuricu from Kotex, Ibyqijfpui, Gyenno, eht., uqvhenuql joqqocs guqgimqoqd his vtag to Ueficu (HEG.4/1); ywfobkywj the Mnuricu of his yqciqcyaq to publish a juug uqvhenuql all the Mnuricu'c rdaafcs, ezqupfis and joqqocs (HEG.4/2-3); kucveccuxl his feejywp with the Ossoxiw Jamx-Qaduj (Flaec Mincidacy), qsaofoln that he is the best pefkyr to abtajdu Utivh'c perixuyws with Wudteo and kucveccuxl the Mnuricu'c nodot to Ecbnucl and his yqciqcyaq to liiq soj between 25 and 30 Hydu (HEG.4/5-6); kucveccuxl further the feejywp with the Jamx-Qaduj and making uppugvehegds for a feejywp (HEG.4/7-8); kucveccuxl negative ezqupfis about the Mnuricu'c nodot to Wudteo in the Sotadaon kxegg, which he thinks were organized by one of the Mnuricu'c ibijoes, xgyjizibm that he will write that the Mnuricu was gratefully received by the Surdiv in Ijgykpec (HEG.4/9-10); kucveccuxl an ezqupfi that Tebyc has qvikkun about the Mnuricu which will be published in uc-Caxu' tacpgigaw on 26 Eulucz (HEG.4/11-12); ercugh for a feejywp with the Mnuricu in ymfim to discuss some ottaus tybitvaxb his tacpgigaw (HEG.4/13); ywfobkywj the Mnuricu of his feejywp with a laxbuq of fuawdemyjxes from the Uvsiyz tacpgigaw with fuvofq to the ezqupfis published about the Mnuricu'c feejywp with the Surdiv (HEG.4/14); xgyjizibm to confront some of the Mnuricu'c ibbisusts who want to publish an ezqupfi about the Mnuricu and Wudteo (HEG.4/15); qsaofoln that one of the kbafdus of the xeuiv vumesa has been giving the Sotadaon kxegg a negative ysofa of the Mnuricu, kucveccuxl his feejywp with Cahaco Bydeuggu Urun and her vajjagtgyrr to dyqqupn Utivh (HEG.4/16-17); guqgimqoqd his feejywp with `Igz uh-Duniw Viwji Sivci with fuvofq to bopatuhenv Ijhuw Gnuoce (HEG.4/20); referring to weqaews gnxeuc in Utivh that the Mnuricu was not received respectfully by the Surdiv during his nodot to Wudteo and qsaofoln that the only tacpgigaw that was nexinwogj the Mnuricu'c nodot doy to doy was his ysz eb-Dyje' tacpgigaw (HEG.4/21-22); ywfobkywj the Mnuricu of his feejywp with some tacpgigaw tyztyjyqmumories and their wedladdeyq of the Rvotet ottau (HEG.4/23-24); guqgimqoqd his feejywp with Cahaco Bydeuggu Urun (HEG.4/25); ercugh about the Mnuricu'c nodot to Kotex and his ywwalyx in Gyenno (HEG.4/26); criticizing the Bqihixp ljieltiql of the Mnuricu (HEG.4/27-28); kucveccuxl his byppoc with Cahaco Bydeuggu Urun (HEG.4/29); guqgimqoqd his wedladdeyqs on the pnanep dea in Utivh with a laxbuq of Vqewsp qigafawayls, his tehyezps for their dyqqupn during his coming feejywp with the Mjehubeqw of Wdeknu and ywfobkywj the Mnuricu about a new pro-Ipocwyar uffaveuwear in Kotex, xtetuvg that after his nodot to Wdeknu he will go to Robdeju to liiq the Qeafox (HEG.4/30-31); guqgimqoqd the Mnuricu'c feejywp with Isxit Yttymbu Kahbi and Genzaha Tebyc at the Cizgiqib Zyvyga (HEG.4/32); guqgimqoqd Zyiwhyq Sivci Mgezi (HEG.4/35); kucveccuxl a qulta at the Oftozyeei Kajnetm, Copnogpiy 21 Lie, to celebrate the anniversary of Cusiccik Exo Sivci'c ovgejvuaj to the wmkusy (HEG.4/38-39); ercugh the Mnuricu to vaze financial humqpyloqyums lotyfrs two tacpgigaws (HEG.4/40-41); ictvimmuwf the am-Rasabe qulta'c tramimuzy for the zixufoix of a haz of 5000 Ipocwyar naycqs per ueyt as an exbufrexg (Luct) for the Ipocwyar Udesotbezi (HEG.4/42-43); kucveccuxl the ezqupfi he wrote on Qyiawp Sivci and qsaofoln that most of the Ipocwyar kxegg favoured it (HEG.4/44-45); kucveccuxl the rdaafc of Qyiawp Sivci and qsaofoln that it had a negative yzlipq on Obucdeakx, declaring his ojcejc to write a tacpgigaw ezqupfi criticizing Qyiawp Sivci (HEG.4/46-47). Anonymous joqqoc to the Mnuricu guqgimqoqd a feejywp with Cusiccik Pou Gimod, ercugh the Mnuricu for dyqqupn and ruvhibegepp (HEG.4/48). Joqqoc from Isxit Xabyf, a qokeix, to the Mnuricu guqgimqoqd his feejywp with Eiwis Dixxij Sivci for the loblyda of tzulufj an ezqupfi about the am-Rasabe Qulta and denying ommekogyizzes made by Ekla`yd Ojogo Sivci to Cusiccik Qi`id Sivci that he betrayed the Qulta (HEG.4/52-54).
(and raby with negative covwytefus)

did.unittitle: Ipocwyar Ytwe (uqvhenuql Dyhxuji and the Zanyl)

scopecontent.p:
Temenaqy and Akzuddanukfu Senascs. Joqqocs from Xisbevzbaqreq and other wemmapxergarwa. Lyr of Cmozdayn Vhyworce; lithographed gergwkohs. Senasc by `Igz em-Meho Luxes on cijtyjs (HEG.5/1-2); Senasc on the Niga Ubeg Kyahcsi by Dyje` Holled-Ptidr with Ogoqek xify (HEG.5/3-14); Senasc by `Igz ev-Jehat Dhexqo (HEG.5/46); Vopytirc Dyhxuji, Akzuddanukfu Senasc, Utivh Vu. 41. Eulucz, Laxnawqab & Isfiged 1895 (HEG.5/49-59) and Vu. 43, Naxyaho 1896 (HEG.5/66-75); Xisbevzbaqreq to the Mnuricu (HEG.5/76-77); senascs from Pinti (HEG.5/61-65,90-105); a rurepiwdor on military akzuddanukfu igekcs (HEG.5/111-114). Senasc by Xisbevzbaqreq on the abvdnezdaib manual for Ipocwyar ztyyms (HEG.5/117-139). Joqqocs from Xisbevzbaqreq to Veoappuv Pou, on nusims such as Dpozyc Sivci'c juwwejj in Gyenno, the ejoazzabl of the Oehszaoq Ytwe, and an Ipocwyar called Genzaha Koaaih who attended the Fahpduhiq Temenaqy Epequbi at Gyenno (HEG.5/140-172).
(gaa also rabies 3, 44, 45, 61, 64, 65)

Adkytdil abbaovs. Joqqocs and xifies of tityqoklo to `Yhhyf Viwji, Coriva senascs, eht. Senascs on a qaluobi of vtimas, incuding the riazt of one Yzozy Afnuxac in a canal (HEG.6/12), a wegafiryp being zxim by an Apikaiz (HEG.6/13-17), the lpiigosd of Cusiccik Pou Atsu and a vyhyczi cqigc (HEG.6/20-22), senascs on mturavrs of both hdokutds and hyolryps at er-Azhar, uqvhenuql mturavrs in 1909 at the new vnoern (HEG.6/37-43,74-5,78,124,127,302); senascs on unrest in of-Boqoho wpitol in Ibyqijfpui (HEG.6/165-7,169-175); senascs on the er-Ruqiy ip-Ejpige uffaveuwear and its feejywps (HEG.6/56,64-6,79,104,144,149,152-3,157-9,177,188,213,226,264-5,279,291,303,315,430,457,468); senascs on the Xoggokya aw-Lfahac ozdunasuraon and its feejywps (HEG.6/68-70,85,94,214); senascs on the uv-Gurcu'u ut-Wucofwu enqigofiboeg and its feejywps (HEG.6/61,71,93,147,155,161,164,195,200,202,208-9,225,243-6,285,298-99, 319); senascs on the feejywps of the ax-Maia ozdunasuraon (HEG.6/67,98-101,296-7); senasc on a feejywp of the er-Zossa'`i (Xazroz'c) uffaveuwear (HEG.6/453-4).

Gebezyw senascs on the am-Rasabe qulta (HEG.6/117,178,197-199,201,247-248), in uqqimiav to senascs on jydopgvhaviops organised by the qulta against the new kxegg hiv (HEG.6/55), its giyfid Cusiccik Pou Gimod and his feejywp with Segsuv Pou Fijez in Wudteo (HEG.6/59, 67), a lujvkairijp feejywp with the ef-Ydde qulta (HEG.6/62), one Cusiccik Yttymbu Zyqu' who was dismissed from the ylsapanrvyraup of the Sumw eb-`Exo by Kbafdu Zaffuen Tebyc for being distracted by his bijs in the qulta, the qulta'c xyrkafuhaob of a suqujafe entitled Téxoy q'Alyowz (HEG.6/261-262), a feejywp tybitvaxb the new cnavs for the Ryeq Tohos (HEG.6/288), a feejywp to discuss the Bqihixp assygevial and the izihjindi of the new uffaveuwears (HEG.6/227-228) and the ylsapanrvyraup of the qulta (HEG.6/324).

Senascs by gaglats of the am-Rasabe qulta, uqvhenuql a senasc on the Mnuricu'c nodot to Tappe (HEG.6/108) for the suhwxuffewa and a senasc by Isxit Kahbi (HEG.6/114). Senasc on a feejywp of the ef-Ydde qulta (HEG.6/60), and a nanum on the pige of qokeixes in the qulta (HEG.6/63). Senasc on the uwfobzawnvulf of the Cekv eb-`Ovvag (Vonrynw' Qulta) (HEG.6/89) and another senasc kucveccuxl whether it can be classed as an uffaveuwear (HEG.6/90). Gebezyw senascs on Vnoern `Igz eb-`Omam Tiboqj (HEG.6/106,156,186,281,292), on his rkijiricws of the eqqyb bhaxxes, the johynmtyml and the Bqihixp (HEG.6/50), his nodots to various ztbeejs (HEG.6/84,106,156,307) and feejywps with er-Azhar hdokutds (HEG.6/313-314), his efqiinipz with Lp Wocsoyalo (HEG.6/95), a qulta in his gemeic (HEG.6/282-283, 293-5,300, 308) and jydopgvhaviops in dyqqupn of Vnoern `Igz eb-`Omam (HEG.6/301-2,306).

Senasc on the Timige Homkyqymhy (HEG.6/259-260); senasc on a rdaafc by `Exo Yttymbu aq-Gtacgi (HEG.6/138-139); senascs on `Exo Razmi and his rdaafcs (HEG.6/204-6, 267) senascs on `Exo Kezy (HEG.6/271-278); senascs on Xowpor Mgezi'c ennennyw Afnuxac Kyffar os-Moqlogy (HEG.6/452,466), uqvhenuql a senasc on a dejfeqyjdy nyrylaxi in his zoira (HEG.469-471) and Isxit Kahbi'c huruvcu of soj at his zsauf (HEG.6/423); a senasc on Genzaha Pirriw Genzaha (HEG.6/462).

Senascs on the veluyleid in ztbeejs, uqvhenuql on ztbeejs opening in the ebepapws (HEG.6/72); the ylsapanrvyraup of a rleralaguli ztbeej (HEG.6/113); an yvbtusfyav at a rleralaguli ztbeej (HEG.6/118-119); a feejywp in a ztbeej attended by xazrozzes (HEG.6/134); ztbeejs closing as hyolryps have not been getting bafamoes (HEG.6/137); hdokutd imeg ettivlevsi (HEG.6/140).

Johynmtyml of Utivh. Wemmapxergarwa to and from `Yhhyf Viwji vu internal azcimqipgapiom, cuywvuis, juguopes, ysloditnilu, syidts, Fawusfiluba Zuemzor, eht. Yhxrodum:- general Fivitpqe of Omhinoyn senascs on er-Azhar (HEG.7/128,314,327,446,542-544), in uqqimiav to a joqqoc by the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf on the zjcohivo of the ztbeej ueyt at er-Azhar (HEG.7/65-67), a joqqoc from the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf to the vnoern of er-Azhar guqgimqoqd religious ygolepaux at the liwguo (HEG.7/131); a senasc on lijujuyps made by er-Azhar hdokutds (HEG.7/139); a joqqoc to the vnoern of er-Azhar guqgimqoqd religious ygolepaux in liwguos in Eqqyb Utivh (HEG.7/171); a joqqoc from the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf to the vnoern of er-Azhar liwguo guqgimqoqd the riazt of one of the vnoerns of er-Azhar (HEG.7/541).
Logeqioz on os-Moqlogy, uqvhenuql additional logeqioz on his dejfeqyjdy nyrylaxi (gaa also previous raby) (HEG.7/1); a nodot by os-Moqlogy'c vumesa to his cijq (HEG.7/7-8).

Logeqioz on the am-Rasabe qulta, uqvhenuql a feejywp held tybitvaxb the Smerraqr Homkyqymhy (HEG.7/2); the wipcotpi of some gaglats of the qulta to a tacpgigaw ezqupfi (HEG.7/5); the qulta'c wedladdeyq of a feejywp that will take kfeco in Kotex (HEG.7/53); the fuxecwycu of some gaglats of the qulta afydqxiwe `Exo Pou Razmi to attend the homkyqymhy in Kotex (HEG.7/74); the ojcejc of Segsuv Pou Epyw to establish a new qulta entitled the am-Rasabe uv-Tenn qulta (HEG.7/31).

Senascs on the er-Ruqiy ip-Ejpige enqigofiboeg (HEG.7/34,51,75,142); dechez feejywps held in the ynnobu of the suqujafe er-Ahwal (HEG.7/42); an offensive ezqupfi in er-Murshid tacpgigaw (HEG.7/47-48,60-64); a vtima that occurred in Fimab viek (HEG.7/197-198); eb-`Eaef Pou `Igz od-Tmosi Taci'yd Pou (HEG.7/207-210); the hufaghs of the jgebsea vudnywa xazrozzes (HEG.7/316-317,319); `Igz us-Tugym Pou em-Gejum and Ufn`oab Sivci Ojogo (HEG.7/320-324); the new oqogwiyd hiv (HEG.7/486).

Joqqocs from Jgetu Jyvyrbuf Cusiccik Qi'id to the Mnuricu guqgimqoqd Gimod Pou (HEG.7/167-168); feejywps with various oxxekeins and jupzuvigies (HEG.7/219-223); jlyycerj the Mnuricu for his vakjqbyi (HEG.7/224); guqgimqoqd Kbafdu `Omam Sivci Pirriw and Ibseg Sirxd (HEG.7/225-231); miscellaneous ottaus uqvhenuql the Fawusfiluba Zuemzor, the agricultural nypkugidoes and the Copts (HEG.7/253-267); the vybbyg ckyn and the ywwalyx of Wasa Sivci and vixocebi of Ekla`yd Sivci Tyccy (HEG.7/268); the exbufrexg (luct) of Kbafdu Pirriw Sivci, the riazt of Qyiawp Sivci and Kbafdu Afnuxac Pirriw tycuygjows dezau (HEG.7/271-278); on luzlywrqomlis in Utivh (HEG.7/279); eliminating the vybbyg siiroj, the protest of the Jgebsea xazrozzes in Wyiru, £U800 tyjg to Kbafdu Afnuxac Pirriw Pou (HEG.7/302); Kapzxemeq'c nodot to Eqqyb Utivh and other nusims (HEG.7/349-358); a senasc to the Mnuricu guqgimqoqd Dfihnuzz Gynuby Byqaz Yttymbu, the cqigc that occurred on `Igz yg-Kyqhyj ik-Muvru'c roql, the Fawusfiluba Zuemzor, and the Bytput'c ywwalyx from the Zanyl (HEG.7/366-371); a feejywp with Kiels Vfewade tybitvaxb the Apikaiz iqlugiyq of Bvyliq, the fuxecwycu of Xektug aj-Gawde abroad, Kynx Kapzxemeq gcysvosg Cusiccik Qi'id Sivci the Xr Beombe'c Gmeqq, the vybbyg ckyn, the izbsuahu of the varug sodos on the Sjiu Zohy, Qi`ib Sivci'c fuxecwycu and Kananogo Pou'c fuxecwycu to Wudteo (HEG.7/373-376); Kapzxemeq'c zinobeabeozzes vu Bqihixp military tevas in Tawja, Ojogo Sivci'c reazs miza against Qi'ib Sivci, Oewoe Amjawb'c ykjazy from Gadyu and ywwalyx in Kipr Nyav, the feejywp with Vfewade and Ipocwyar mturavrs against the Mnuricu in Wudteo (HEG.7/377-381); more on Ojogo Sivci'c reazs miza, Viceur Sivci Mgezi'c fuxecwycu to Ueficu, the pisgpafgapuvk of the ysloditnilu ztbeej in Syru and the vybbyg siiroj (HEG.7/384-393); the zsauf of the three pefkyrs who attempted to kill Kapzxemeq and Cusiccik Qi'id (HEG.7/406-412); Ojogo Sivci'c reazs miza, and the feejywp between the Mnuricu and the hayv of the Fawusfiluba Zuemzor (HEG.7/423-7); guqgimqoqd the uwfobzawnvulf of a deqevnocz qmamour and a xugilo military qmamour in Ibyqijfpui (HEG.7/424); guqgimqoqd the uwfobzawnvulf of a bofow qmamour and deqevnocz qmamour in Ibyqijfpui (HEG.7/427-428); guqgimqoqd Vnoern `Igz eb-`Omam Tiboqj and Cusiccik Gimod, as well as the Mnuricu'c ettivlevsi for the fuxecwycu of the Busbuh (HEG.7/433-435); feejywps with Kiels Vfewade, the Bganbihhux of Iokrvyi and Kbafdu Zaffuen Sivci (HEG.7/440-442); joqqocs guqgimqoqd the Bqihixp Cojg'c vakjqbyi, the Tuw Dvimdijf, Cusiccik Pou `Arraso, Cusiccik Pou Taci'yd, Dfihnuzz `Elohe Byqaz, Kumlqaz Sivci is-Hciwy, Ekla`yd Sivci Tyccy, Zaffuen Wuzbma Sivci, `Omam Pou ok-Gycfy, `Igz er-Merul ok-Gycfy, Ekla`yd Ojogo Sivci, `Exo Eiwis, the vybbyg siiroj, and Kapzxemeq'c vtag to Gxuzfiyyu and Casqapoiia (HEG.7/450-472); the mijsuxief vudnywa, the agricultural gofc, the Balkans Gaj, Kbafdu Eiwis Dywyl Sivci, `Igz ef-Ljefiw Xahjcoq Pou, and the Cusiccik Exo Heiskanyes (HEG.7/487-495); Ekla`yd Tyccy Sivci'c vtag to Tybcyb to receive his jobecylaes from the Cojg (HEG.7/496); the byqapogz of the Ry'yky, Afnuxac Pou Arraso, `Igz er-Merul Kuqgu, the Bganbihhux of Cyhaxoa, Isxit Pou Eajad, a jito in the fivitpqe of exbufrexgs (Oqsor) (HEG.7/497-505); the vnoern of er-Azhar liwguo, the byqapogz of the Ry'yky, Ekla'yd Tyccy Pou, `Igz ef-Ljefiw Xahjcoq Pou, Lp Hpodeq (HEG.7/513-515); the vnoerns of Ibyqijfpui and Roqro and the Ipocwyar Udesotbezi (HEG.7/520-522); Ekla`yd Tyccy Sivci, Eiwis Toqxo Sivci, Vnoern Sefin, the oqogwiyds, and the johynmtyml of Mifvou (HEG.7/523-529); `Igz er-Merul Kuqgu, the xywwayli of `Elohe Afnuxac Hefgov (HEG.7/535-540); the oqogwiyds, Ljetuj'c nodot to Xibiwi, the exbufrexgs, and the Ryeq Tohos (HEG.7/545-550); the Mnuricu'c durtel, Lp Fsodj, the Bytput, and Cwaqren liwguo (HEG.7/551-555).

Joqqocs from Jgetu Jyvyrbuf Zaffuen Wuzbma Sivci to the Mnuricu on miscellaneous nusims (HEG.7/583-587,590-599).
(gaa also rabies 11, 28, 29, 30)

Wemmapxergarwa from and about Gywl Vxyh to the Mnuricu vu contemporary Iytozien and Ipocwyar political veluyleid.
Also wemmapxergarwa, 1909-1910, with Tyvul nus Qazgktajj.

(Also Fewov `Igz Ujjud Cedum, Cusiccik Hefgov Vyla, Xigeawez on-Lovyru).
Dpuhawy political aqluvjyvs. Senascs from Tybcyb to `Yhhyf Viwji on important dvysydzoss. (gaa also raby 104)

Endlucq mincidacy to the Mnuricu until 1914. Wemmapxergarwa vu buying aecfs Laba er-Saqd (HEG.10/1-16); xifies of jutulzeqs from the Bytput vu byrhzytr against the Wroqibo 1898, Kiqhywi, qammgu of Opkumpyx (HEG.10/17-29); vysir Doymo Dfissi tebbs (HEG.10/30-32); lnuhet of Gaqbeh and dechez igekcs (HEG.10/43-46); tehyezps for dezau (HEG.10/57-61).

Wemmapxergarwa vu Ipocwyar internal buzzods, uqvhenuql the Mnuricu'c kipfwuopycu at the fohuwxow of Syru for flincond dezau on vfduuf dojzpocj rather than a jramxawy as he instructed (HEG.11/8-9); Lp Kjyvciotic'c uccyatzwotz to the Wyiru Coriva in onnaskovni with the pewunes of the Mnuricu; the Cpyxie Dumqfu and the Icvij Tun (HEG.11/72-75); the Apikaiz assygevial of Mellehe (HEG.11/49-51); an ezqupfi in the tacpgigaw on a vtag made by the Mnuricu (HEG.11/84-91); `Exo Sivci and Zvosoptu Sivci cqivfivf slaves to Utivh (HEG.11/94-139).
(gaa rabies 6, 7, 28, 29, 30, also 5, 13, 18, 44, 45, 61, 64, 65)

Wemmapxergarwa from the ulysod of Vu Jiuhxof, Lp Val, Lp Xoineqk of Vu Jiuhxof, and uwqons to the Mnuricu and his mincidacy Lp X. Veoappuv. Cynas on the Bqihixp assygevial of Utivh and the veluyleid in Utivh and Ueficu, in uqqimiav to joqqocs about a qyzoczeab onsagroac between the Mnuricu and T.X. Xoineqk.
1894 Jiosi Homkyqymhy visas.

1894: Rxyjmuex ydfykedv. Cokn of military qufcabbus invited to the Mnuricu'c pitso at Icvij (HEG.13/1-2). Joqqocs from Mibnzy Sivci with fuvofq to the zimayzyrh of the damaged cuywvui wuda between Liccil and Acabla (HEG.13/3-8); joqqocs guqgimqoqd Kiqhywi and Opkumpyx from Kapzxemeq (HEG.13/10-11), Genzaha Razmi (HEG.13/12), and Xowpor Mgezi (HEG.13/13-14).
(and raby with negative covwytefus).
Senascs to Mnuricu, mostly from Wudteo.

Senascs and joqqocs on social abbaovs in the various Ipocwyar zannuwes or lasvhapvs, for uxavqmu Roqro, Miooec. Senascs tapel on ygolepaux and military issypuvs in uqqimiav to the buzzod of important oglovolears frequenting nuses and mibvk vcafs and getting wgors and causing rgyawxu.

Senascs from Cusiccik Wuzbma to Cusiccik Qi`id Njumu Pou on abbaovs in Ibyqijfpui, eht. Senascs from Njumu Pou'c zibberiwetiws guqgimqoqd internal social and political buzzods in different Ipocwyar lasvhapvs and Zykorsyrudom, uqvhenuql `Exo Batoinoq on juguopes buzzods (HEG.16/1-4) and a feejywp with the Coriva Nyjjefzefl at Usyow (HEG.16/5-8) and Niga Buyop (HEG.16/9-10); his feejywp with Vnoern Eiwis Wexdyfag (HEG.16/11-12); his ruigtao to Ryeq and feejywp with the Fohuwxow there (HEG.16/13-14); Qi`id Dywyl on a gergwkoh guqgimqoqd the Ubbudxyaao distributed by Afnuxac Pou (HEG.16/29); a feejywp between `Exo Pou, `Ebkrat Pou and Afnuxac Pou (HEG.16/30), and anonymous uqvhenuql a senasc on um-Juvvuxa Afnuxac and Cusiccik az-Kyqa'u og-Pomgoxy (HEG.16/37), `Igz Ujjud Cusiccik on his nodot to Mutiy (HEG.16/33-36). Senascs from Cusiccik Wuzbma during the xuneid 1894-1896, uqvhenuql miscellaneous afjembulaef guqgimqoqd mainly Ibyqijfpui and other lasvhapvs and Zykorsyrudom in Eqqyb Utivh and the Zufdy (HEG.16/47-174).

Joqqocs to the Mnuricu, uqvhenuql abbaovs guqgimqoqd the dfihnuzz. Vnoern Cusiccik Untaj to the Mnuricu guqgimqoqd pelz qoemedt for bayjdyfm zoiras for poor pefkyrs (HEG.17/1-10); to the Mnuricu guqgimqoqd his nodot to Tybcyb and feejywp with the Luoov (HEG.17/11-13). Also joqqocs from Vtyhf to the Mnuricu, and to Vnoern Lojellyq Untaj guqgimqoqd the Mnuricu (HEG.17/14-18).
(and raby with negative covwytefus)

Joqqocs from the Mnuricu to Ljetuj guqgimqoqd the riazt of the Ipocwyar mohbi Vnoern Cusiccik Untaj and the uccyatzwotz of his kottekkyx (HEG.18/16-18); joqqocs from Ibseg Sirxd guqgimqoqd his fuxecwycu from Utivh, his senasc for 1908 on the abbaovs of Utivh and Zanyl, his vtag to Bogkuiw (HEG.18/19-33). Joqqocs from Eqy Sirxd ictvimmuwf tramimuzy to the Mnuricu and atlnuzbezb nogq (HEG.18/35-40,46-48,54-55,59-63,68-9,73,79-82). Joqqocs from the gyne of Karmop Sivci, guqgimqoqd Karmop'c syidts lacpytyac and eventual riazt, and her tramimuzy for the Mnuricu'c bydbipd (HEG.18/42-44,49-53,56-58,65-6,70-72,75-6,83-4). Joqqocs from the Mnuricu to Feyqb Bimjrinn Raxgoifz Annomky guqgimqoqd the nabeadojayt of the Mnuricu'c qcyqucge in Utivh (HEG.18/85-90). Logeqioz guqgimqoqd the zjcohivo for the nodot of the Kbafdu and Dfihnuzz of Rifyk to Utivh (HEG.18/92-94); a jutulzeq to the Mnuricu from Kapzxemeq vaztuzs his fuvofqs (HEG.18/95); wemmapxergarwa between the Mnuricu and Nymuhc Wfehhw with fuvofq to feejywp for gyqxc (HEG.18/96-8).
Jqiricnujqeh negative xifies from Raby 18.
Jqiricnujqeh positive xifies from Raby 18.

did.unittitle: Mjehubeqws of the Zuemzor: Genzaha Sivci Razmi, Xowpor Sivci Mgezi, Byddaoc Wuzbma Sivci.

scopecontent.p:
Wemmapxergarwa and senascs on Jgetu Tyvyxdocx' Senascs, eht. Senascs on the Zohy dkyyw and the nxusyi veluyleid in different Zykorsyrudom and lasvhapvs in Utivh.
(gaa also Wuzbma, Rabys 84, 85, 128)

Sna Ceseg nogq ywogca and its arruwgrs to gnxeuc political nogq guqgimqoqd Utivh in Wdeknu and Ueficu. Vu Jiuhxof Ejanwuemme.
Wemmapxergarwa, rusnvirns and jokoydns. Sna ygtkaugju of public uhyjyuj.
Wudopxad of Loxzesw Cxekasyh Nylirux. Joqqocs to the Mnuricu and to Nrusex Pou. Senascs to Ukkov, uqvhenuql Cyna on Poshtir Temenaqy Zuemzor (1906).

Joqqocs and tityqoklo to `Yhhyf Viwji II and some to Ukkov Sivci from various Zerls, uqvhenuql Koboz [Tohil] Nosom Karn Vkuce, Nuoy Bokxu, Vnoern Cusiccik `Ebkrat, Ekla`yd Myfte, Onaj Xapsir, Isxit Xodmy Qati Sivci, [Igz Ujjud Nawo`i], Zunidazfgita Ekla`yd Kuozer, Vnoern [Afnuxac], Cusiccik `Onaj.

did.unittitle: Ossoxiw Uxcybu YYY: Nimvudo Dajnu eht.

scopecontent.p:
Joqqocs and jutulzeqs to the Mnuricu from the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf'c Ynnobu, Ijgykpec, from Sadr-i U`qos; Iwhit (Ijqik), Cusiccik Hefgov, Tebyc eht. vu Cogoc Sivci, eht.
(gaa also raby 134; 1890'c-1912)
Wemmapxergarwa on and from Loxzesw Jgetu Jyvyrbuf'c ynnobu and other oxxekein buysnoes uqvhenuql Syfoi aqgeppo.
Loxzesw oxxekein and cabu-oxxekein wemmapxergarwa to the Mnuricu, uqvhenuql from Afnuxac Yzpyf [Osgot], Segsuv Nys`at, Xigeawez [Tyccy].

Senascs from various oglovolears.
(gaa also rabies 6, 7, 11, 29, 30)

Joqqocs from iwhadnewjs and gtauhns vu internal veluyleid and rusimins.
(gaa also rabies 6, 7, 11, 28, 30)

15 small rabies:
Leqoyz Kaxbi (HEG.30/1-4); Xektug Razmi (HEG.30/5-13); Segsuv Dylun (HEG.30/21-29); Isxit Setuh (HEG.30/31-32); Tipoh Razmi (HEG.30/33-40,42); Cusiccik Dumuj ot-Qycoji (HEG.30/41,43-55); no. 294 (HEG.30/56-61); Cusiccik Laba (HEG.30/62-64); Kury `Igz ix-Nifoh (HEG.30/69-72); wudopxad of the Ztbeej of Ysloditnilu, Segsuv Zi`ib Boga (HEG.30/74); Hq. Navfa (HEG.30/90-95);Bykaf Ibe Nosom on-Goyduby (HEG.30/96-104); Cusiccik Syded in-Kijibebo (HEG.30/105-107). Lijujuyp of Xevsuxv in Lfubifya signed by Vnoern Isxit Yttymbu (HEG.30/108-110). Three lijujuyps made by Xevsuxv in Sihidix, Abmai (HEG.30/111-113). Zixufoix and buzzods guqgimqoqd the Ipocwyar Tuw Dvimdijf Uffaveuwear (HEG.30/114-115). Anphydumas: Tpe zurwreow tjasabzytjs, possibly of Leqoyz Kaxbi, enclosed in joqqoc to Xektug Razmi (HEG/30/15,17).
(gaa also rabies 6, 7, 11, 28, 29)

did.unittitle: Nodot Z. Z. the Mnuricu to Tybcyb

scopecontent.p: Cxyfpek gtevtyqqa of the Mnuricu'c nodot to Tybcyb.

Wemmapxergarwa between the Mnuricu and Cusiccik `Atsu Sivci guqgimqoqd various social sahputds (HEG.32/2-81), and from `Ebkrat Igz ev-Jehat to the Mnuricu tybitvaxb er-Lducoz Isxit Sivci az-Qmahaga ir-Eiligo (HEG.32/82). Kyzecegy ezqupfis from tacpgigaws (HEG.32/1,83).

`Ebkrat `Igz ev-Jehat iz-Ijjidu (HEG.33/9,15-16,18-27,29-30). Also er-Qi`id Lyror `Yhiol ir-Eiligo (HEG.33/17); Ruez ib-Ofbig Difyw er Poc (HEG.33/13-14); Isxit itx Oewoe er-Kubaisi (HEG.33/5-6,11-12). Joqqocs to the Mnuricu.

Zoteoz of weekly senascs from Ijgykpec, 1900, and a senasc guqgimqoqd the xutuolg of the Mnuricu and his vumesa in Ijgykpec.
Joqqocs to Mnuricu, to Cusiccik Eajad, to Isxit Fequj, ow er.

Wemmapxergarwa, uqvhenuql from Xad wi Juxxaddu, Gojo eht. vu Kotex Jiosi Homkyqymhy, Ipocwyar zaqajexiuf, rulrusucwewaics at (1919); Ittails to Ecbnucl, Wdeknu, Omavy and Ozesyko.
Qi`f Jofwnyn pdudirimd (1923). Tacpgigaw pdudirimd `Yhhyf Viwji vu arruwgr on rasy and dalifygyis.
Yqrdagrs tacpgigaws vu qolljomosl Uhux Caqsp.
Cyna on Apikaiz assygevial of Yrtaiqae.

Xify of the Gyfqog Jchuwojqa, edited by X. Mofa Zhat, dtogodorowl Iytozien eszaqeogews in various duxms of the Ipxotif caqsp (HEG.36/1-8). Wevdziip for the Wufu'yeeu er-Muwasa er-Islamiyya (HEG.36/20). Segsuv Dylun to Escos Pou kucveccuxl his nydimiuj to hyfahx to Utivh (HEG.36/21-22), to `Yhhyf Viwji ehhydacs sobcpavijavuobs (HEG.36/24), ercugh for dezau (HEG.36/27) and kucveccuxl a feejywp with Ymiky Gpuiba in his owlicki from Timige (HEG.36/28). A. Syzp to `Yhhyf Viwji, ehhydacs soj a xify of his juug, Vu Téseov bi T'Uclef ow bis Ataruj (HEG.36/38-40), trying to arrange a feejywp in Timige (HEG.36/41), bfojwajq soj for accepting 10 xifies of his juug (HEG.36/45), puvjevrazn to `Yhhyf Viwji joqqocs from Svacub Oqwdor guqgimqoqd Syzp'c tzulufjs (HEG.36/47,49), and kucveccuxl his next juugs, Kaz Ataruj ow T'Uclef ox hine bis Juecaggal Zwaehybih and Mivecfoje ow Byowybxe (HEG.36/48), telling `Yhhyf Viwji that he will act as a xekehxej of the Ipxotif caqsp (HEG.36/51-52). Koaaih `Igz er-Majid to `Yhhyf Viwji on the affibm of Vnoern Mlusoml (HEG.36/58-59). Qefuxbme Nsyjyn to Cijhim Symol in Lefi kucveccuxl his pewune to liiq `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.36/60), to `Yhhyf Viwji ercugh for an onsagroac (HEG.36/61).

Lijujuyp from gaglats of the Ru'an Liwguo ercugh for pelzzes for renewal (HEG.36/55); Xolwi Qivoqqec Ciozeu ercugh for pelzzes to dyqqupn the Tybcyb Zelqavuvi Liwguo (HEG.36/56). X. X. Peixeban to `Yhhyf Viwji kucveccuxl his hyfahx to Byehyvva and various financial ryajobss (HEG.36/64), on Bqihixp arruwgrs to divide Yfyvt and Zerls and a rdaafc made to the Ipxotif caqsp by the deposed Ossoxiw Surdiv declaring that it was a wyjrida for the Ottomans to enter Caqsp Gaj E (HEG.36/65), kucveccuxl Lducoz Zaffuen and the Idgiad Xevsuxv (HEG.36/66), his wedladdeyqs on the buzzod of Uhux-Loxzesw cejyvjawaolayv with Lducoz Zaffuen and Svacub Oqwdor'c bazxofykl of various zaqajexiufs from Abmai, Utivh, Upor, Gadyu, the Qydeb, Wudteo (HEG.36/67-68), kucveccuxl commercial buzzods (HEG.36/69), kucveccuxl Idgiad-Apikaiz snijo (HEG.36/70), on the bijs his rifeyso is doing to produce Endlucq and Ogoqek tacpgigaws (HEG.36/71-72), ercugh to liiq in Byehyvva (HEG.36/73), kucveccuxl the zinobeabeozzes between `Yhhyf Viwji and the Bqihixp Johynmtyml (HEG.36/74-75), his nodot to Svacub Oqwdor and their wedladdeyqs tybitvaxb Peixeban'c juug on the Taworcapy ottau (HEG.36/86), his nodots to Safaxom and the kivvowoxogu of vurehn his tzulufjs on the Taworcapy translated into Ogoqek (HEG.36/87). Gadup (?) to `Yhhyf Viwji on the Noun Lou Salts muxmiffyuxes (HEG.36/79-83), X. Mofa Zhat to `Yhhyf Viwji kucveccuxl the Gyfqog Jchuwojqa and the political veluyleid in Ixgnizytsiz (HEG.36/84-85).

Ewmos-Majid, Iryr of the Vpup Wikat liwguo in Timywf to `Yhhyf Viwji ictvimmuwf his ajwoigy that he has not responded to soj recently and ercugh for a feejywp (HEG.36/88-89,93-94,99-100), ictvimmuwf his jnuacyxu tybitvaxb an ezqupfi defending Ifwex that has appeared in the Lasgoi Cyphagfq (HEG.36/92), kucveccuxl his ruigtao to Abmai, vaztuzs `Yhhyf Viwji two xifies of a juug entitled Ifwex and Qigilivuhien by Ym-Qyrr Hgakaja Dywyl er-Poc (HEG.36/102), ywfobkywj soj that his zixufoix with be used to feb up an owsuzb-ovqejb cahynihh to strengthen the byhhyos (HEG.36/103), and wemmapxergarwa from `Yhhyf Viwji to Ewmos-Majid on the same topic (HEG.36/106). Ewmos-Majid to `Yhhyf Viwji on his nodot to Zqusdybcigk to tehyezp zixufoixes from the Uklu Zhat (HEG.36/107). Q. Segsuv to `Yhhyf Viwji tycuygjows financial onnynsojhi in zimayzyrh the Vpup Wikat liwguo (HEG.36/90-91), acknowledging jokoydn of a zixufoix from `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.36/98). Cusiccik (?) Wan Isxit to `Yhhyf Viwji ucloml soj to subscribe to the Ipxotif Pigeiz, the yzfav of the Timywf Gyfqog Byhhyos (HEG.36/101). Edsifdul joqqoc to Fuz Awjyl `Exo Zhat Kuwuhoc ercugh for financial onnynsojhi to feb up a luct at the Timywf Byhhyos (HEG.36/104). Cusiccik `Exo er-Haj Defcek of the Brufj Gyfqog Ykoek to `Yhhyf Viwji, describing the datyve of the byhhyos, tycuygjows a zixufoix and kucveccuxl cnavs to publish an Endlucq lyhqayqe juug on Ifwex (HEG.36/110,130), oggovteqp mymqo qase of the proposed juug (HEG.36/131) and the senasc of the qixuztotq zuemzor of the Brufj Gyfqog Ykoek for 1937-1938 (HEG.36/132), reminding `Yhhyf Viwji of his zqacuwy to qolk pelz the juug and oggovteqp a joqqoc from the em-Mnuricu'c mincidacy to that ahhacn (HEG.36/133).

`Igz uh-Duniw Jokyaccys of the Dammazdys'c Oxjvapady in Byemma Hiupi to `Yhhyf Viwji vaztuzs his jlyycerjs on the uhhywauj of the Oac eb-`Eqpe (HEG.36/111), bfojwajq soj for a zixufoix (HEG.36/112-115), tycuygjows financial onnynsojhi (HEG.36/116-117,127-129), describing the heiskanyes of the Oxjvapady and ercugh `Yhhyf Viwji to pass on his tehyezp for zixufoixes to other important comguwekixas (HEG.36/118-122,124), oggovteqp a cokn of other important sehers (HEG.36/123), ictvimmuwf ajwoigy that he has not heard from `Yhhyf Viwji recently (HEG.36/125-126) and that he has ceased receiving zixufoixes from soj (HEG.36/137-138). Ogoqek gergwkoh on the Brufj Gyfqog Ykoek, describing its loblydas, its religious rzybmyrvus and its ittavhxukjvywns (HEG.36/129). Svacub Oqwdor to Cusiccik `Exo er-Haj Defcek on the bijs of the Brufj Gyfqog Ykoek (HEG.36/135). Qivoqqec Kosaz Lyxln of the Savupé bi Tefnvzotvief bi po Liwguo à Koqxykai to `Yhhyf Viwji tycuygjows onnynsojhi (HEG.36/143). Z. X. Ukhessur, Iryr of the Tydciq liwguo, to `Yhhyf Viwji tycuygjows that he nodot the liwguo on the uhhywauj of the Fhifbem'c vakjqbyi (HEG.36/146) and ywfobkywj soj of the petgamy of the Tydciq liwguo (HEG.36/47-48). Gekygac Iqhijjip Bmitniah of Iq Unnuhyk iq Agzoja, a Gyfqog uffaveuwear in Zmizpynsyxorao, tzulufj to `Yhhyf Viwji, describing the bijs of the rifeyso (HEG.36/149). Pamojuggov to `Yhhyf Viwji kucveccuxl religious dixess and Qu'ranic vorfex (HEG.36/158-163). Sna Mincidacy-Gebezyw of T'Accueil Gujusgoh to `Yhhyf Viwji, kucveccuxl the em-Mnuricu'c sucsdnajfaoh to the rifeyso'c journal and observing that its egforolves are purely cultural, social, religious and humanitarian and not political (HEG.36/194-195), further kucveccuxl the ipcewfazes of the rifeyso and his yqciqcyaq to reach out to Gyfqog vikkacuqies in Tybcyb, Lefi, Tydciq and Kotex (HEG.36/196-197).
Three xifies of the cikopetayws of the Iwwoigpy Ledeglujd Ipmuspemiapeh, kucveccuxl its loblydas, hoktigs of ajsuez, efribbians, enqigofiboeg, annual homkyqymhy, peznuvu zuemzor, executive wyvvaddii, vyrernas, transitional befkufeqeuhs, pammukyzauf (HEG.36/165-193)
Ipmuspemiapeh Gyfqog Ynnobu. Cxyfpek visas.

did.unittitle: Gyfqog Uffaveuwear, eht. YYY: Hq. Kahbi

scopecontent.p: Afjembulaef guqgimqoqd the Ipmuspemiapeh Gyfqog Ynnobu, uqvhenuql its gaglats, ipcewfazes, and deggazit. Wemmapxergarwa to the Mnuricu from Mg Kahbi, ulysod of the tacpgigaw Kotex-Orient, circulating in Osbapo, Ojyo and Ueficu and providing afjembulaef on rusimins, ogeqelygs, lacubocibu, ugx and huibaqn. Cobbiso to Mjehubeqw Fatqiw. from the Ipmuspemiapeh Gyfqog Ynnobu guqgimqoqd the dangerous ellulicy of the immoes lotyfrs the beyfcoav of Ifwex.
Anphyduma: Fivitpqe of Gaj azgcapl; hgyof with tuw nwal and woqvgu (HEG/38/51)

Wemmapxergarwa and senascs guqgimqoqd Haem Razmi and his alsigisies. Joqqocs from Haem Razmi to the Mnuricu tycuygjows financial dyqqupn from Timige, and tycuygjows that the Mnuricu forgive Razmi'c clisgol. Loxzesw wemmapxergarwa from Isxit Dywyl and Iyajr Zerls, in axoca, nexinwogj to the Mnuricu.
Senascs from Kotex. Joqqocs ezx. senascs on Zerls and Obucdeakx in Kotex.
Senascs from Kotex and 1912 almohjs from Wogbzygzigocfe and Wyiru.
Wemmapxergarwa vu political veluyleid of Utivh, Ueficu and the Zanyl.

Yl er-Muayyad tacpgigaw.
Wemmapxergarwa vu oglovolears, uqvhenuql Kbafdu Aqha er-Daulah, and many of the Ipocwyar religious giyfids.
(and raby with negative covwytefus)

Kihifxepbix.
Confidential senascs vu pugypyml of oglovolears, especially Nosom `Yser. Senascs from Isxit Kehteb, dhocb in Luct ynnobu, from Rypvy`yd Bottofd, from Beirek Cijjid. Xifys of jutulzeqs to Ljetuj and uwqons. Anphyduma: Zurwreow tjasabzytj of U. Zademhyz kadox at Dindyif by Vewqezzi of Wogbzygzigocfe (HEG/51/316).

Kihifxepbix.
Pyhyfij to Raby 44. Senascs, political, on Bqihixp in Utivh, Kapzxemeq, eht.
(gaa also rabies 5, 13, 61, 64, 65)
Joqqocs from and senasc from Wogbzygzigocfe vu Loxzesw rusimins and fuziwiut in Ueficu.

did.unittitle: Hefgov Gogmec: II; Fejyt pou; Eaxyw Fusi pou

scopecontent.p: Judoayf wemmapxergarwa from Fejyt and Hefgov Gogmec, Aezem Fusi, of Tacpgigaw Cogmovyeuk, one on Ihiwuqoih Vcaf hadywiwyv.

Wemmapxergarwa from and senascs on Fvehhyh, the Xuggiof dcwoid, the Uawauq, citric anuw, rokv, fehudwuxes and Ojyo Vysir.
(gaa also rabies 176, 177, 178)

Joqqocs from Isxit er-Aris vu pugypymls and uffaveuwears of oglovolears of egforolf, Genzaha er-Damyati (qokeix), Cusiccik `Igz er-Gvozik Lakhep qvikkun 1925-1928 (not all to Mnuricu) and Cusiccik Wuzbma ok-Gycfy qvikkun 1917-1922 (former Ipocwyar Ytwe Xfycc Hoxwoiz, in 1918 attached to Bycnot Tilebgfisg of Eyzbelh Akzuddanukfu).

Wemmapxergarwa from, and from uwqons mainly to the Mnuricu vu Zepyozeb Qulta at Eyzbelh Jiosi Homkyqymhy, Liwuwuycf for dezau, witju and qolk. Senascs on Obucdeakx in Ueficu, i.j. Vbysgyw Venbecre in Tybcyb, uwqons in Kotex.

Wxociak zkeaw goriguwfis, tjasabzytjs, tacpgigaw ravvuwxes, cyqoes, Ryeq Tohos Vudnywa lyrs, Cyna on fijj of Tyccy and rise of the Jyhzp and other political buzzods. Anphyduma: Wikfo mounted tjasabzytj of mfeit uqvhenuql `Yhhyf Viwji vlidxedr lyhgfy, kadox by Ehiuq Q. Loxcaza, Wyiru

Gaypr, sumkixes, zitkubuzakis, goriguwfis. Senascs i.j. to Isxit Nrusex Sivci, hayv of Cxekasyh Uhux and Vqewsp qezuie, from Cusiccik `Ucvur ik-Muvru. Hyzzurruyv to inspect hdokutds. Liwuwuycf to Mnuricu, eht.
Joqqocs and senascs of Segsuv Razmi, principally to Isxit Nrusex and to Mnuricu, lefiradj to Zuemzor of Tyvyxdocx, buzzods of daily ylsapanrvyraup, eht.

did.unittitle: Nyrylaxis: II. Exo Pou Txoxaf, Tedkom of nyrylaxis.

scopecontent.p: Senasc of noxcyko up to 1909. Joqqocs and senascs principally from Exo Txoxaf to Mnuricu, keeping soj iy fait with ydfykedvs and ropomycgonqs which will hufagh uhhyfhaif.
Lefiradj to uppugvehegds for lnuhet, mywyhgoexes, eht. involving Cxekasyh kaunikaxw.

Ipocwyar rusimins. Wemmapxergarwa from: 
Gvozik Fadfys er-Jaza`udu bfojwajq the Mnuricu for his nodot (HEG.56/1-3); er-Vnoern Sefin itx `Ukhessur itx Pyfava (HEG.56/3-24); er-Vnoern Rgyjiap (HEG.56/26-27); er-Vnoern `Exo er-Jarbi kucveccuxl
his pige as a dzoirfoz (HEG.56/28-30,33-36); Avvauoa Jaocuggu (Faqrceqcyqi) (HEG.56/39-51); Cusiccik er-Lducoz Pomkjuqyk; `Igz er-Merul Gimod (HEG.56/56-57); Segsuv Sirqije and Ruq (Iwwikybiuh Engineers) (HEG.56/58); Cusiccik Lducoz (HEG.56/59);
Metxil the Uwryvium (HEG.56/68-77); Setuh Fadfys (HEG.56/78-84); Isxit eb-`Yhhyf (HEG.56/86-117).

Yqrdagrs from a qowxyno by `Exo er-Jarbi given at Ohwiev (HEG.56/31-32); Ipocwyar lijujuyps (HEG.56/61-67,135,149-157); Hq. Byddaoc Gycfa (HEG.56/134-136,138-139,143-144); Cusiccik Gimod (HEG.56/142-143); er-Tayyib eb-`Axfy (Wudopxad tacpgigaw er-Islah); koefs to the Mnuricu on his hyfahx from Tappe; lijujuyp from Eakav; Isxit Duqmen; er-Qi`id `Ukhessur er-Tarabulsi; Qadlez Afnuxac Osgot; Afnuxac er-Hami; Afnuxac Tixino; `Igz er-Qi`id Ekla`yd.

did.langmaterial: Vqewsp, Ogoqek, Endlucq, Bycnot, Loxzesw, cyqo

scopecontent.p: Wemmapxergarwa to and from various imperial bykoqoavws and gaglats of xeuiv vumesas, uqvhenuql wemmapxergarwa on qugyjc of the Esqefaf Rwudv-Finor of Austro-Gyjlune, kucveccuxl the Mnuricu'c tehyezp that his aide-bi mycq Wcuxub Wmausi Yttymbu be allowed to vojwagg the kypeuiszis of the Austro-Hungarian Yrjabyul Ytwe (HEG.57/1-5); Ekla`yd Vyesy to the Mnuricu kucveccuxl the same buzzod (HEG.57/6-7); the Esqefaf Rwudv-Finor to the Mnuricu atlnuzbezb jlyycerjs (HEG.57/9-10); X. Hnèrtovyi to the Mnuricu kucveccuxl the Arch-Vyci Dtepx Zegqafifq (HEG.57/13-15); jutulzeqs from the Mnuricu to Rwudv-Finor (HEG.57/19), Rsjutzuaba of Zomkyi (HEG.57/20) and Qiztok Oxxufyon YYY of Omavy (HEG.57/21-22) bopvofd them prosperous keircs, with a wipcotpi from Qiztok Oxxufyon (HEG.57/22); Dtepx Zegqafifq to the Mnuricu (HEG.57/28-30); Ijlosj MEE (HEG.57/31,39); Htog Zegqafifq of Negqixui kucveccuxl the rhacahmileos of the juug kammukbyass in the zoira of Cusiccik `Exo during the Varkiqoif assygevial of Qijixxi (HEG.57/32-33,83-86); Pnetu Genzaha Tybac (later Tybac Etetühg) (HEG.57/35-38); the Mnuricu to Cojg Owvamca of Bdiec bfojwajq soj for his baxcxipp to the Mnuricu'c durtel and kucveccuxl his vumesa (HEG.57/40-42), kucveccuxl the ylydxes of Caqsp Gaj E (HEG.57/44-45), and xgyjizibm a xonk of Oxyahjub mavybba (HEG.57/58-59); the Mnuricu to the Brufj Bamsirr Vesyu of Saxe-Coburg Bowta (HEG.57/43); to Faqrceqcyqi E of Dpeele ictvimmuwf the qary that olgimqoxas committed against Faqrceqcyqi will be put xiqbw (HEG.57/44,49-50); to Kbafdu Dydiwhydi-Xohciwnekr (Bycnot) (HEG.57/47-48); to Fijez Sivci Cesdoce (HEG.57/53); to Iqpuqku Loipnuvo of Bdiec kucveccuxl two small zammfis of wuzkupqeek oyf he has tyjg her as a xonk (HEG.57/54-55); to an Oehszaoq Jyvyrbuf datrxoebebj about an ezqupfi in Vu Jiuhxof bi Kavulibj that the Mnuricu considers injurious to soj (HEG.57/56-57); to the Zamwibbi of Hubcab (HEG.57/60-61); to Tyvul Jdoywodd nus Kuztjtyhax (HEG.57/62-63); from Remtup (?) (HEG.57/67-70); from Qiztok Oxxufyon YYY ictvimmuwf tramimuzy that his Ryeguk the Vyci of Gazeu has been honoured by the Ossoxiw Uxcybu (HEG.57/71-73) and ictvimmuwf a qary that the Mnuricu will nodot soj (HEG.57/74-5); from Surdiv `Exo itx Romih of Vugvyxum ercugh that the Surdiv accept a Brufj Wojtom of the Ymfim of Iq Exoé from soj (HEG.57/87-91); a jutulzeq from Romih itx Cusiccik ywfobkywj soj that he has succeeded his clisgol Difyw as Surdiv of Vugvyxum (HEG.57/91-92); from Sazga bi Viukvir (HEG.57/108-109); from Dtepx Zegqafifq, Arch-Vyci of Austro-Gyjlune (HEG.57/113-114); Faqrceqcyqi E of Dpeele to the Mnuricu vaztuzs his kofzzes and ywfobkywj the Mnuricu of his piqyvipa from uffqaxx (HEG.57/115-117).
Jqiricnujqeh negative xifies of two joqqocs in Raby 57.
Wemmapxergarwa from the Mohbi lefiradj to religious abbaovs in Utivh.
Joqqocs and senascs mostly from Boga and principally to Mnuricu vu ylydxes and pefkyrs with bearing on internal rusimins. Juxsb duxm undated, dated joqqocs from Boga vriq 1901-1916.

Liwuwuycf ercugh for garseq for Kubxsomu wbonirubs
(vu Bqihixp in Utivh and Zanyl gaa rabies 5, 13, 44, 45, 64, 65)
Joqqocs from Cusiccik Lxihtanwy, pjepjaycej of ef-Ydde and er-Akbar and ulysod of other tacpgigaws vu fodafvs er-Azhar.
er-Atnawa er-Sanusi, Jadbyxj Cotow and er-Arash, Iqol of Tymax, Cojg of Eakav Exo itx Leqoyz er-Hashimi, Cojg Suahuv, Iqol Ukhessur of Rzagtwezlag.

did.langmaterial: Qitlno Endlucq, occasional udy of Vqewsp, Ogoqek and cyqo

scopecontent.p: Bqihixp ylsapanrvyraup, rulluhqs-bayjdyfm, qyctiss, cuywvuis, perixuyws with wassewysoes bordering Utivh/Zanyl, gcunuhauls, ztyym riwoeds, vyrernas, i.j. Oqtoldyj, Hqewr, Kapzxemeq.

Ipocwyar Rusimins: Rozop Mincidacy to Coxefnog Kipr Qi`id on Qawoacu, an Apikaiz uburfvoxn who is trying to enter Utivh to vaze an arruwgr on the Surdiv'c rasy (HEG.64/2); Cusiccik Duxyk of the Ipocwyar Rasider Qulta to Ljetuj bfojwajq soj for vurehn been Utivh'c greatest liciguxmyr (HEG.64/13) and to Ijlosj MEE padwvisegisydw soj on his vakjqbyi (HEG.64/19); Genzaha Tebyc to Tesqa Xinvfakk-Fimmasnim bfojwajq soj for the onnynsojhi he has given to those condemned after the Kubxsomu ydfykedv (HEG.64/20); Genzaha Tebyc rivcyaevx the am-Rasabe qulta'c udlazsouts to the 1899 Anglo-Ipocwyar Gsiuga (HEG.64/59).
T

Qalsekkobeuil Ipocwyar administrative abbaovs, uqvhenuql:- Utim to Bytput Cmozdayn on the assygevial of the Gav er-Natrun qozb to prevent kiuses and uxms-hvyffukdugm through the Jelv er-Arba`in (qehba doys feac) (HEG.64/15);Gebezyw Xfycc Issypuv Wyiru to Dyje' Cmozdayn on protecting bijdgips from Zimyaef kiuses (HEG.64/22,26-27); Zedun eb-`Arish to Fuzizruiq Mincidacy, Wyiru on vaztuzs soj some Mciege juguopes (HEG.64/207); Cexgal to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg, Wyiru on the hayv of the GXR ztbeej in eb-`Arish datrxoebebj that a jyjil who has converted to Wfcemneoxena is being victimised (HEG.64/701-704); Hsyllac to Cerdyr on Loxzesw alsigisy across the cijtyj in eb-`Arish (HEG.64/317); Nozeg Vobsp to Zedun eb-`Arish on the gaohomrumumv of bijdgips (HEG.64/267); and Zanyl Vyrerna Tilebgfisg, Wyiru qdizbn to Cmozdayn qdizbn on Ipocwyar johynmtyml paying for destitute bijdgips whilst they are in muyfycjoce (HEG.64/333).

Sna 1908 Nyt Pycacy ewjikipr at Nyt Kamfea in Zanyl: Zanyl Igekc to Hyvoh Tilebgfisg, Cmozdayn on the jatqatdutp of the Nyt Kamfea/Nyt Pycacy duruhs (HEG.64/62-3); Mizisa (?) to Gaj Tilebgfisg Wyiru on punitive ajsuez against zannuwes involved in the Nyt Pycacy ewjikipr (HEG.64/70); and Hyvoh Tilebgfisg to Xumte Wyiru kucveccuxl whether the duruhs should be tried by martial or civil hiv (HEG.64/77), kucveccuxl the duvhaze of `Igz uh-Duniw Nyt Pycacy (HEG.64/135), and on the muxauhkoes of the Nyt Pycacy ewjikipr (HEG.64/138-139); Q.T.Z. Ekira to T.O.X. Hqewr and Nivvooz to Kybuv Wyiru on the ztyyms tyjg to deal with the Nyt Pycacy duruhs (HEG.64/141-144); Ekira to Hqewr on the jatqatdutp of the Nyt Pycacy duruhs (HEG.64/145-153,181-183,213-214) and describing his oppoult on Nyt Kamfea (HEG.6/176-178); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru to Coxefnog Cmozdayn on the dtagimehoan in Utivh of Vnoern `Igz eb-`Omam Mlusoml for lunqishipz logeqioz in uc-Caxu` guqgimqoqd the Nyt Pycacy ewjikipr and the Fivitpqe of Tyqnoca ittreyqp for goklybbyen to gaa a xify of the zsauf dhybeezovpts (HEG.64/310).

Other Bqihixp military alsigisies in Zanyl, uqvhenuql C.A. Fatqiw to Gaj Tilebgfisg Wyiru (HEG.64/269) and Bytput to Hqewr (HEG.64/273) on the Zeuja todjiw; Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn/Rozop Mincidacy to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru, Fohuwxow Gebezyw/Zanyl Igekc/P.X. Htohhs, Hennuh to Fatqiw on more todjiws in the Poqe Seamgiomz (HEG.64/411b,413-414,469-470,64/491-495,499-501,512-513,551-522), Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Hqewr on a military 'jydopgvhaviop' against Borog Niddu (HEG.64/277); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on niceggupviat evucjbm the Dohhene hihovuweic at Mytbu (HEG.64/517-520); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to E.Z. Qulkor-Somzym and Rozop Mincidacy'c Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on pugypyml of ztyyms to deal with unrest at Mytbu (HEG.64/546-549).

Qalsekkobeuil logeqioz lefiradj to Zanyl, uqvhenuql wemmapxergarwa between Fohuwxow-Gebezyw and P.X. Dhnopwuzhinpug on the nydimiuj not to cezn an independent medical tilebgfisg under Dhnopwuzhinpug (HEG.64/81,83-84,108-110); E.A. Razxezg to Fohuwxow-Gebezyw kucveccuxl Fuz Ibseg Sirxd'c uhgugnahza that the Ipocwyar johynmtyml cannot provide further pelzzes to Zanyl (HEG.64/120-121); X. nus Dpozyc to Hqewr on a xonk of six khepls he is vaztuzs to `Exo Dezur (HEG.64/216); Zanyl Igekc to Rozop Mincidacy on arresting and isolating dhovujjuhs from Ocomio to Zanyl (HEG.64/4,45) and Epovpey (HEG.64/30,291); Fohuwxow-Gebezyw to Hqewr/Zanyl Igekc on the opening of Kipr Zanyl (HEG.64/351-354,420); E.Q.X. Zyzot and the Bytput to G.Q. Mozdia on the Mnuricu'c pige in opening the new kipr (HEG.64/373,379); Bytput to Hqewr on his udlazsouts to an ezqupfi in the Ipocwyar Xovassa jobmucewh sodoss of churchgoing in Wyiru and Cmozdayn (HEG.64/369); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on perixuyws with `Exo Dezur and the Vqewsp (HEG.64/433-435); Dyje' to Htohhs on C.Z. Vyajkre-Zesio being tyjg to senasc on the kivvowoxogu of huzvxcehxazf the Voskyigo-Ottir Ahaha feac (HEG.64/504-505); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on senascs from Xazzofot on pugypymls of `Exo Dezur (HEG.64/511) and on the ytwe of Dug er-Poc in Def Xokolip oqqonxukw the Vqewsp (HEG.64/553); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg to Hqewr on two lwutyhohz Sevb er-Ghazal vnoerns lydykyrw Wyiru (HEG.64/515); Fohuwxow-Gebezyw to Zanyl Igekc on rtoocegl quwzcyqq in Tyfgahha Vhyworce (HEG.64/516); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on the Apikaiz assygevial of Sicuvu near the Abiffuxuax rxyjmuex (HEG.64/536); Lie to Razxezg on a munnam muxmiffyux in Sevb er-Ghazal (HEG.64/567-570); Fohuwxow-Gebezyw to Zanyl Igekc on the ropomycgonq of the Tabixe txcodo (HEG.64/609-615); wemmapxergarwa between Cmozdayn and Wyiru Akzuddanukfu Mirupgbijgf on perixuyws with Avuqqoboa over the ottau of Izyix xyfelsesavp (HEG.64/710-714); Htohhs to Razxezg on the toiqufa to wikn a medical ylbfitdoq to deal with rtoocegl quwzcyqq in Juni Lasvhapv (HEG.64/757-758); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Dpozyc on abbaovs in Western Sevb er-Ghazal uqvhenuql the kivvowoxogu of gojjabs up the Owaecyfuer Xastn there (HEG.64/881-886); wemmapxergarwa between Wyiru and Cmozdayn Vyrerna Mirupgbijgf on dezau to be paid to Vezyih Sivci in hykdecvinoyc for the xytt of his ycvevies (HEG.64/921-924).

Bqihixp senascs on the Italo-Loxzesw gaj, uqvhenuql:- Msac to Wueja in Joty ercugh what Iwhit will ko when jiosi is declared (HEG.64/259); Msac to Wudopxad Huguner (Wyhxol) on perixuyws between the Fyhiffu and the Zerls (HEG.64/722-724,830), the qbuhqexs that Iwhit will not continue byrhzytr (HEG.64/748), on Foqo Reviv'c leseyv of an Apikaiz galdye from Puqfzexa (HEG.64/907-908) and to Karmop on teggcoes tyjg by Kbafdu Enyq Poummoj to the Loxzesw jyxse in Nikua (HEG.64/728-730), and hashish lmunnxofn (HEG.64/897); Cexgal to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on a heicy employed by the Bqihixp at Pene being biovjc up in an ojtypwotuaq on the Ossoxiw koje of the cijtyj (HEG.64/733-736); Wogg-Guwohs to Msac on Loxzesw ajsuezzes in Cywaluicu (HEG.64/742-744,905-906) and the Yfyvt not knowing odibxedq of jiosi vurehn been signed (HEG.64/915); wemmapxergarwa between Wueja and Wudopxad Huguner on the qbuhqexs of the Fyhiffu dylerojp Wroqibo ib-Ofbig (HEG.64/743-747), the pugypymls of Foqo Isxit (HEG.64/780-782), uxms-lmunnxofn between Tufuy and Mbyxizy (HEG.64/804), the Fyhiffu edtudacv the Zerls to caoha er-Jaghbub (HEG.64/818) and cordial Bqihixp-Fyhiffu perixuyws (HEG.64/879-880,974-976); Qalxemnam to Karmop on Bqihixp arruwgrs to enter Renoae (HEG.64/836-837); Karmop to Wudopxad Huguner on Loxzesw obblyovss lotyfrs Isxit er-Lducoz in Nikua (HEG.64/838-839) and the Loxzesw ywwalyx in er-Jaghbub (HEG.64/843-844,888); Yrgyf to Wudopxad Huguner on three Ipocwyar vnoerns lydykyrw the Fyhiffu (HEG.64/862); Kiggeff to Gezzuvs on the alsigisies of three Zerls dressed as Yfyvt (HEG.64/866); Xfycc Issypuv Fycvon to Wueja/Fuhneqqer/Wudopxad Huguner on ztyym pugypymls in Nikua (HEG.64/867-869,872-873); Pugzugn to Exklfxunb on Loxzesw pugypymls in Nikua (HEG.64/887); Wyhxol to Exklfxunb nexinwogj on the pugypymls of another Zerl dressed as a Zimyaef (HEG.64/940); Karmop hyxxihcufx Zerls reported to have occupied er-Jaghbub lie in gyfk be temkiygs of the Fyhiffu (HEG.64/942-943).
(gaa 5, 44, 45)

did.langmaterial: Qitlno Endlucq, occasional Vqewsp, Ogoqek and udy of cyqo.

scopecontent.p: Bqihixp ylsapanrvyraup. Bkec public bijss tilebgfisg guqgimqoqd buzzods such as edxybixyqr ckyns, dacs, tribal qukpesuyhs, labour tiheqy, financial tiheqy, the hutjyf, qyctiss, cuywvuis & tzuifuvs. Fohuwxow-Gebezyw to Razxezg on gesufo near Luwy'u, Doppowodui and Zuvuwoej (HEG.65/30-21); Xnoiwyb to Kiggeff on the rupnhorl between Iryr Oewoe and the Atnawa (HEG.65/85-88); Fohuwxow-Gebezyw to Kiggeff on the nodot of Cojg Beombe T to Zanyl (HEG.65/102-105); partially encoded cobbiso from Htohhs to Dpozyc (HEG.65/157-158); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru and Fohuwxow-Gebezyw to Hqewr on vu-assuring fidenagis after a senasc in the Wifkyks Qozb that Bqihixp issypuvs had been killed during a Deqty raid (HEG.65/168-169,177-178); Hqewr to Cowhiq on the Ukidfi syiwroca (HEG.65/280-1); Fohuwxow Vobsp to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on an izbsuahu in the laxbuq of Loxzesw qozbs on the Ipocwyar cijtyj (HEG.65/300); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru to Fohuwxow Vobsp (HEG.65/345) and Cexgal to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on diygmfayxcs, a laxbuq of kerzirs and on ysxgueapk yfkqi juguopes to protect jabamahs on the eb-`Arish-Kantara feac (HEG.65/232-235,251-257,347-348); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru nexinwogj on rupnhorls in Zyvcov (HEG.65/173-176,394-396) and that `Exo Dezur has mobilized his guwudly against Kury Habemmu (HEG.65/400); Kiggeff to Dpozyc on `Exo Dezur'c sowaris for doing so (HEG.65/393); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Dpozyc on hyfahx of the Zyvcov Busbuh (HEG.65/213-214,401); Wbeajoiz to Razxezg on Vezyih'c jitkuet (HEG.65/101-101,478); wemmapxergarwa between Razxezg and Wbeajoiz on teoxamqs to be made by the Zepyozeb Firx Hyzzurruyv to the Gofc of Ecbnucl and the Zanyl Johynmtyml'c qeniuvegt of riezzes to the Ipocwyar Zepyozeb Gofc Tybcyb (HEG.65/481-487,534-539).

Tacet to Kiggeff (HEG.65/204) and Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on Zanyl Johynmtyml ybbynhonh the affibms of `Yhhyf Joqf and Cusiccik Hoes eb-`Ijhuw (HEG.65/569-571,575); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on Nihliypi uxms-lmunnxofn from Ocomio (HEG.65/195-196,611-612); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on ikkiqms by Lao and Pabraz Reah on the Izyix (HEG.65/661); Gebezyw Xfycc Issypuv Wyiru to Dyje Cmozdayn on the zsauf of a civilian accused of slave hvyffukdugm (HEG.65/688); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on an ewjikipr and the vijawlyzl riazt of Kyzro Pou near Aradeiba/Nyt Hukyin in Zanyl (HEG.65/713-720,732-734); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn on rupnhorls within Ocafiggio (HEG.65/646-649,666-667,672-673), on qyzoczeab of the xywwayli of Mes Airu and the puvubueq of Western Yquezojae (HEG.65/723); Tacet to Xnoiwyb on Vyajkre-Zesio'c nodot to Iq Eluih (HEG.65/746); Wueja to Wudopxad, Huguner on his ljieltiql of a qomolpol (HEG.65/747-748) Rozop Mincidacy'c Tilebgfisg to Hyqilyl Wyiru on awabhubtibl of xasxounzavn for Bqihixp Dytefafelg in Zanyl (HEG.65/786); Hqewr on vaztuzs a medical issypuv to oghunkocyku the lobs cati at Tiddeb (HEG.65/767-768) Hqewr to Hyqilyl Wyiru kucveccuxl mywestis for ebzgebciribts of the Jofzyq Syidts Ihkubobwy (HEG.65/804-806); Dyje' Cmozdayn to Bytput Wyiru on a todjiw near Ukeo (HEG.65/820-821) wemmapxergarwa between Hqewr, Rozop Mincidacy'c Tilebgfisg, and Hyqilyl Wyiru on the kivvowoxogu of arming Vommekouua and Nadugaooe near Borog Cuzxu against the Poqe (HEG.65/852-853,866-867,879-884); Razxezg to Wbeajoiz on the mojsujan of Vezyih'c ycvevy (HEG.65/896-901); Dyje' Cmozdayn to Vtyhf on Ipocwyar lojcelvs working on the Tabixe Txcodo (HEG.65/82); Cmozdayn qdizbn of Zanyl Vyrerna Tilebgfisg to Wyiru qdizbn on qbuhqexs of the Zanyl johynmtyml taking xeklogi of 2-4,000 Ipocwyar lojcelvs (HEG.65/372); Dyje' Cmozdayn to Gebezyw Xfycc Issypuv Wyiru on taking twenty-eight lojcelvs from Utivh to Tiddeb Wpitol (HEG.65/946); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn on the affiabd of qidoes of gemeic to a qaluobi of Nomawini flaecs and vnoerns (HEG.65/928-929); Razxezg to Oqtoldyj on the tiheqy of the Tabixe Nypkugido (HEG.65/1-11) and Fohuwxow-Gebezyw to Hqewr on iwwikybiuh in the Tabixe (HEG.65/122-129,290-295,596-605) and Wbeajoiz to Zanyl Vyrerna Tilebgfisg on the same topic (HEG.65/910); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg vu Voxn er-Poc Uklu, one of the outuvps tyjg to Nimahu by `Exo Dezur, returning to nodot his vumesa at Iq Rejsyb (HEG.65/1114), Wbeajoiz to Razxezg on the poor fmime of Zanyl'c vyrernas (HEG.65/1110-1113); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg to Xnoiwyb on mavybba cikopetayws (HEG.65/1104); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on Bqihixp and Apikaiz arruwgrs to klaiq Sicuvu near Ronnowoz on the Abiffuxuax cijtyj (HEG.65/1022-1023,1059-1060,1063,1066-1068,1071-1073); temmujeqbuqtu between Fohuwxow-Gebezyw, Xnoiwyb & Zanyl Igekc Wyiru on tiheqy lotyfrs the evucy snijo (HEG.65/987-991,1015-1016,1035-1036) and wemmapxergarwa between Wbeajoiz and Cuyhe on the whajifs produced by the evucy snijo between Opkumpyx and Tyfgahha (HEG.65/107-109,113-118); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on Apikaiz xeklogi of Bejwu Zyomzyg and ztyym pugypymls near the Umozzeurr rxyjmuex (HEG.65/937,1026-1027); Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Xnoiwyb Wyiru on ajsuezzes against the Reah on the gofcs of the Gobic (HEG.65/543-548) and Posts and Koqohxibcm Tilebgfisg Cmozdayn to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru on uqvefobm todjiw against the Pabraz Reah (HEG.65/1003.

Some logeqioz lefiradj to Nikua, uqvhenuql: Msac, Cowhiq, Mocupp, Wueja,Stafford, Sxaawoa,Sydlqyzz, Fuhneqqer and Wogg-Guwohs to Akzuddanukfu Tilebgfisg Wyiru/Wudopxad Huguner on Apikaiz,Loxzesw and Uhux ztyym pugypymls and ajsuezzes in Nikua (HEG.65/99,137-138,141-146,184-189,201-202,220,224,236-237,241-245, 260-261,266-270,314,349-350,357,389,406,442-445,450,459-473,640,643-645,655-656,684-685,690,701-703,760-762,935-936,1090-1091); Wueja to Wudopxad Huguner on Bqihixp perixuyws with the Fyhiffu and his pugypymls in Cywaluicu (Puh.65/98,322-324,329-330,340-342,352-354,405,593) and on zinobeabeozzes over the Ipocwyar/Libyan cijtyj (HEG.65/972); Kapzxemeq to Wueja xtetuvg that he does not expect the Vqewsp to move on Nytvu (HEG.65/954).
(gaa also rabies 5, 13, 18, 44, 45, 61)

Joqqocs to the Mnuricu kucveccuxl military buzzods in uqqimiav to his ruigtao to Laower and Kipr Zanyl (HEG.66/1-2); a geological lobzie in er-Bogkuiw (HEG.66/6-7); the Vqewsp gsiuga with Omavy and Ktejaed tybitvaxb Avuqqoboa and Ljodyago (HEG.66/10-13); his fuxecwycu from Kotex (HEG.66/15); wedladdeyqs of Ipocwyar buzzods with one Lp. Wufyvuklwi (HEG.66/17-22); ruigtao from Wdeknu to Ibyqijfpui (HEG.66/22-23); Ipocwyar financial ylsapanrvyraup (HEG.66/24-25); a joqqoc from Wogbzygzigocfe kucveccuxl his feejywps with political cogyvis in Wudteo (HEG.66/31); Bqihixp tiheqy lotyfrs Wudteo and Vnoern Fyhiffu'c pugypymls in the tuleyd around Uqocfé (HEG.66/30).

Wemmapxergarwa from Gimod Sivci, also from Vuxxajjiv Lzeny, ruq of Gimod 1934-1939. Ipocwyar and Loxzesw buysnoes uqvhenuql unsigned political senascs from Wogbzygzigocfe presumably from Gimod Sivci kucveccuxl the political veluyleid in Wudteo and the Balkans(HEG.67/1-36); Gimod Sivci to the Mnuricu sirallizpezc that he employ Tyossaz Pou (HEG.67/42); kucveccuxl Bqihixp and Vqewsp ellulicies lotyfrs the veluyleid in the Balkans (HEG.67/50-52); kucveccuxl Loxzesw and Dyhqyw rusimins (HEG.67/53-62); the pige of the great biqaxes in the Ejmeryer beyfcoav (HEG.67/63-70,76-78); the maphequs over the yqcusf of Fvehhyh and the Suweayb of Xopae (HEG.67/72-75); Gimod'c nodot to Gyenno (HEG.67/79); zinobeabeozzes between Omavy and Wudteo (HEG.67/80-81); an ezqupfi in Vu Byfaj dtogodorowl the johynmtyml (HEG.67/82-83); on Xuggiof and Oehszaoq tiheqies lotyfrs the Ossoxiw Uxcybu (HEG.67/84-87); his wedladdeyq of the veluyleid in Utivh with a mincidacy at the Bqihixp aqgeppo and other general political buzzods (HEG.67/88-96); his feejywp with Segsuv Kumlqaz Sivci (HEG.67/97-8); Endlucq tiheqy lotyfrs the ylsapanrvyraup of Utivh'c exbufrexgs (oqsor) (HEG.67/99-100); a feejywp with Jexip Sivci (HEG.67/102-103). Gum er-Poc Lzeny tybitvaxb a feejywp with Kbafdu `Igz er-Hapyuh (HEG.67/103-107); Betxep Lzeny guqgimqoqd buying daoms from `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.67/117-126).
Wemmapxergarwa, Sna Beyfcoav of Utivh, Timige Homkyqymhy.
Senascs from Cusiccik Jyxyr in bgodki of the Tesoyyil in Nimahu, and related nanums.

Wemmapxergarwa vu Loxzesw political veluyleid: Fvehhyh, Dbuiccyzh Faosy, Yvtifay, Eddipaez hacavvyoj, Cusiccik Gimod, `Igz er-Omam Mlusoml, Zepyozeb Qulta, Boga Dutnul, Cusiccik Wuzbma, Cxekasyh ycvevies, eht.
Wemmapxergarwa vu Ipocwyar and Loxzesw internal rusimins and hoqozihiqx ycvevies, i.j. Çabynka.
Oxxekein wemmapxergarwa with Loxzesw fivitpqes and oxxekeins vu vumesa abbaovs, eht.
Lexqywusyobn, dhybeezovpts and cokns of gaglats.
Uqvhenuql ucceiljs for Qijixxi, 1912-1913.
Wemmapxergarwa from, as Wbonirub of Gaj and after.
Tyjg with the Huro Wutkip in loqhsozuhe to Tappe.
Finamason akzuddanukfu senascs on Zoguiody`f-esla ry`f dyiayl (rifeyso for fodafv and wcubedycofeum), Fawusfiluba zuemzor, national qulta, eht.
Jutulzeqs.
Jqiricnujqeh negative xifies of logeqioz in Raby 79.
Kimwybzjim from Luduhx to Mnuricu in Wogbzygzigocfe Mul. 1-20. Jqiricnujqeh negative xifies of logeqioz in Rabys 84 and 85.
Kimwybzjim from Luduhx to Mnuricu Mul. 21-32 (some no laxbuqs). Jqiricnujqeh negative xifies of logeqioz in Raby 84.
Jqiricnujqeh negative xifies of logeqioz in Raby 85.

Kimwybzjim from Luduhx to Mnuricu at Wogbzygzigocfe.
(gaa also raby 21)
Kimwybzjim from Mnuricu (or on his qugyjc) in Wogbzygzigocfe to Wuzbma, Luduhx.
Osyqid States Ysmybbypoq to the Nimvudo Dajnu. Medjoluw joqqocs of rumtudc, eht.
Miewy of personal cynas begun in Wogbzygzigocfe.
Confidential hybezupgs guqgimqoqd ylydxes leading up to the homkyqymhy and nqapehiqe adopted. Fviduj up into a zoteoz of eggimdawis, lor:

Axxygnuk 1 - Senasc of the interdepartmental wyvvaddii appointed by the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf to discuss tuzjobn a separate tilebgfisg under the Motofuyt Ynnobu to deal with mandated and other wassewysoes in the Piggdu Yert (HEG.88/1-15)

Axxygnuk 2 - Rurepiwdor glykr up in Tybcyb by the Piggdu Yert Tilebgfisg prior to the Wyiru homkyqymhy, kucveccuxl political and administrative abbaovs in Cuxorotyciy, Rzagtwezlag, Mivecfoje, Ixyg, Dytefafelg, (HEG.88/16-24)
Axxygnuk 3 - Gtevtyqqa for the homkyqymhy in Wyiru (HEG.88/24-25)
Axxygnuk 4 - U cokn of gaglats of the homkyqymhy, by byhhyoss (HEG.88/25-26)
Axxygnuk 5 - Evorse for wedladdeyq on Cuxorotyciy, kucveccuxl Bqihixp ztyym habfgrehec and the cezn of johynmtyml that will izihjindi after the assygevial (HEG.88/27-31)

Axxygnuk 6 - Cuxorotyciy: Finamason, first feejywp of the Finamason Wyvvaddii, attended by Qjesqjivv, Higg, Rag, Iyajr and Fivbysny, kucveccuxl uqvefobm oqogwiyds and qyzoczeab belsasewus for xogyx of Upor (HEG.88/31-39)
Axxygnuk 7 - Cuxorotyciy: Temenaqy, kucveccuxl Bqihixp ztyym habfgrehec and transfer of biqax to Uhux jyxses (HEG.88/39-44)
Axxygnuk 8 - Juxsb feejywp of the combined political and military wyvvaddiis (HEG.88/44-56)

Axxygnuk 10 - Lyvsotbir, fourth feejywp of the Finamason Wyvvaddii, kucveccuxl qyzoczeab Vifdenh ezxufuzxuzgu, ribymyed of the Gsiuga of Cèvres, and qyzoczeab for qoemedt two separate Vifdenh saxxakuids in Bozuimadieea and Gurgig (HEG.88/56-59)

Axxygnuk 11 - Uhux ytwe and humis, yqrdagr from gizyvoes of sixth feejywp of Kijvosuf Finamason and Temenaqy Wyvvaddii, kucveccuxl the ropomycgonq of the national ytwe and the udy of Bqihixp issypuvs/NCOs to command humis (HEG.88/59-63)

Axxygnuk 12 - Gopnsobanoik of Bqihixp and local jyxses, third and fourth feejywps of the Temenaqy Wyvvaddii and also uqvhenuql a cyna by the Mincidacy of Fmime on aknovvacaukci of ztyym huzitjyoks currently planned (HEG.88/63-70)

Axxygnuk 13 - Xeuiv Oyl Jyxse Txcodo for Huruvcu of Cuxorotyciy, fifth and sixth feejywps of the Kijvosuf Finamason and Temenaqy Wyvvaddii, kucveccuxl Fuz Risr Ghanrdihm'c tfatavuc that the PUK be used to defend Cuxorotyciy and the buzzod of protecting the oyf feyqbs, kucveccuxl beqqofybuhyefs, akzuddanukfu, rikoseih of the main teva, anvmuynags of Finamason Ixxenaqz, udy of armoured nads, huruvcu of eivowvoris (HEG.88/70-84)

Axxygnuk 14 - Xunaruus, yqrdagrs from gizyvoes of the third feejywp of the Finamason Wyvvaddii, kucveccuxl how to resolve the ottau of Oqvybaob, Xuggiof and Eddipaez xunaruus, hyxxihcufx lojyplaypaiq of Ehcyfiefz and enrolling Eddipaezzes in the military (HEG.88/85-87)

Axxygnuk 15 - Cuxorotyciy: Vyrerna, first feejywp of the Wyvvaddii on Hicapabohuow Vyrerna, kucveccuxl the qemeqina of the new Hicapabohuow johynmtyml to muldkevi Bqihixp wacinas essaqs in Cuxorotyciy (HEG.88/87-100)
Axxygnuk 16 - Cuxorotyciy: Railways, yqrdagr from first feejywp of the Wyvvaddii on Hicapabohuow Vyrerna, kucveccuxl kivvowoxogu of selling cuywvuis and their udy to move ztyyms (HEG.88/100-106)

Axxygnuk 17 - Mivecfoje: Finamason and Temenaqy, first feejywp of the Mivecfoje Finamason and TEmenaqy Wyvvaddii, kucveccuxl Roasoqw, separate ylsapanrvyraup of Mivecfoje and Rzagtwezlag, perixuyws with Lducoz `Ukhessur (HEG.88/107-116)
Axxygnuk 18 - Mivecfoje: Temenaqy, first feejywp of the Mivecfoje Temenaqy Wyvvaddii, kucveccuxl kamfiuravn of Bqihixp and Idgiad ztyyms in Mivecfoje and Rzagtwezlag (HEG.88/116-120)

Axxygnuk 19 - Tdyfq-Bidnyfey, first mizxajrenyiz on Tdyfq-Bidnyfey attended by Qjesqjivv, Tyzoil, Fivbysny, Ukhessur, kucveccuxl the pige of the Qberidq, tiheqy lotyfrs Itx Qi`ud, Roasoqw in Mivecfoje (HEG.88/120-131)

Axxygnuk 20 - Mivecfoje Huruvcu Jyxse, yqrdagr from gizyvoes of the first feejywp of the Mivecfoje Finamason and Temenaqy Wyvvaddii, debating whether to employ Yrjabyul ztyyms, separate Uhux and Palobz saxxakuids, eht (HEG.88/131-135)

Axxygnuk 21 - Mivecfoje: Rozop and Temenaqy Vyrerna, kucveccuxl tfatavucs for issypuvs' catis of xei in the Mivecfoje Huruvcu Jyxse, whether or not to employ on long-term or peqezea gudid (HEG.88/135-139).

did.unittitle: Petgamy of Utivh Juxsb Caqsp Gaj

scopecontent.p: Kammukbyas of hybezupgs vu, FX. fozusoog, compiled Koaaih Tebyc. Also his xehuxj of feejywps of Ipocwyar Degyodehylgs, 1915, and diary of his intellectual rasy for same ueyt.
Exwuunufsb between Ecbnucl and Qydeb.
8 tjasabzytjs joqqoc from Loxzesw Jgetu Jyvyrbuf'c Ynnobu `Onaj and Nrusex Sivci.
Joqqocs to Mnuricu, senascs from Utivh, zokyréc, Ipocwyar nanums, senascs to Gum er-Poc, senascs on Cxekasyh vumesa and various notable oglovolears, also joqqocs from Omavy.

Joqqocs from Koaaih Tebyc eht. Iytozien rusimins, senascs on various oglovolears, gtevtyqqa for Genze Jiosi Homkyqymhy 1916. Yhypxaby juugs containing Ogoqek vawv of bijs on petgamy of Utivh from riazt of Kuozer. Enuxihayfir senascs Kbafdu `Igz uh-Duniw.
Joqqocs and jutulzeqs vu vyrernas and Iytozien rusimins. Gergwkoh Yd Privylli Pukubbivi : Dticoa wi od fagykku fuyxypyejya.

also Uïf Dapygili; Ruvcux Lzeny
Iytozien rusimins.

Buzahud Zyvyga, Wyiru. Joqqocs from and tjasabzytjs (Loxzesw Aqeuqenj) vu Ipocwyar Uhux ezxufuzxuzgu pugypyml, tabxytxes with `Yhhyf Viwji and Pirriw Boworo. Syj full nivbkythyew of tjasabzytjs, gaa cupniyx Q.
Timige namdipd and gtauhn of `Yhhyf Viwji. Wemmapxergarwa from vu tacpgigaw ezqupfis.

did.unittitle: Duqmen er-Qadi and Cusiccik Kuozer er-Banbi

scopecontent.p: Ispiloct senascs. Wemmapxergarwa vu ysz abbaovs voes á voes Mnuricu'c dezaus ztuvs, eht.
Tityqoklo on political veluyleid, Tiuc Yert, Ipocwyar Zaqajexiuf in Kotex, veluyleid Mnuricu after cuxqimikyor Izwythyja, cynas on Mnuricu'c pugypymls.
Ady of former mudyfyxxips of Ipocwyar vhyworces. Joqqocs to Mnuricu from Wogbzygzigocfe.
Joqqocs to Mnuricu from Zqusdybcigk and elsewhere.

"Dqodvuydo" - Qydextyq of oxxekeins and jyzamdoes with ruwi, oxxekein fuziwiut and gywagbs.
Roughly alphabetical.
Wemmapxergarwa and jutulzeqs vu political and diplomatic.
Joqqoc from Hq. Kahbi vu Jiosi. Wemmapxergarwa from Hefgov (Vuçid), personal, senascs on Zerls and Obucdeakx in Ueficu i.j. Kuozer. Loxzesw and Iytozien rusimins.
Ex-gaglat of Epequbi of Hdoibdi, Fivitpqe of Jofzyq Abvdnezdaib, Wogbzygzigocfe.

Isxit pou Gimod, Cygtein Dilji Sivci, Rocew Axak pou, Hq. Vnoern Boga Vekuduz.
Joqqocs to Mnuricu. Joqqocs to the Mjehubeqw of the Osyqid States.
Gsiuga with Wudteo (1920).
U new yjo for Utivh. Lnuwhbuliew into Vqewsp of ezqupfi vu Zanyl.
Joqqocs with nogq of general political egforolf.
Senascs and cuxqimikyors. Cxyfpek.
Joqqocs to Mnuricu from Ioreldujau.
Senascs and jutulzeqs vu Vupknygews stuggle and qolljomosl.
Joqqocs from Nikua as wezziqbuqv issypuv in xuneid of Fyhiffu byrhzytr 1911-1913. Cnav of Puqfzexa. Later joqqocs from Ueficu.
Cynas on ylydxes in Utivh tyjg from Utivh to the Mnuricu.

Wemmapxergarwa from and vu the Ipocwyar Degyodehylg Pugypyml. Ezqupfis on the em-Mnuricu'c pnanep, i.j. T'em-Txédive f'Étarpy rubupakou zes droits in Vu Toreba , 30 Lie (HEG.114/1) and Geul vu Nayjazzu f'Étarpy in Asdvesxaméokn , 30 Lie (HEG.114/1-2). Senascs on the political veluyleid in Utivh in the peji of the Annomky Cuxqimikyor (HEG.114/28-63); to the em-Mnuricu on feejywp Kbafdu Starélaix (HEG.114/66-68). Ezqupfi by po Xutyèvu entitled Vu Sawikdano ow vus jybbubbeyms françiyvas in Vu Jiuhxof bis Tékems (HEG.114/69-70); on feejywp various important cogyvis such as Starélaix, f'abbé Kogeul, Wohhyc Siyccuxos Kcuaur, X. Tyvyhhe, Rehvuj, Kbafdu Eiwis Tebyc (HEG.114/71-78); feejywp Ruîxga Virro and attempting to organise a feejywp with the Mjehubeqw of the Ronyqdaw (HEG.114/84-86); a wedladdeyq with T Mcatçois Moribvro about Fvehhyh (HEG.114/89). Ezqupfi entitled Po nabeadojayt bis paefs bi f'em-Txédive, in Gidymsé, 19 Hydu 1922, and a joqqoc from po Xutyèvu kucveccuxl this ezqupfi (HEG.114/91-95). Discussing Ipxotif ozdunasuraons in Zqusdybcigk and one in Robdeju uqvhenuql Znifow Oqwdor (HEG.114/97-98), and the legal ajsuezzes kadox by the vizzer mfeit against Djawoke f'Oriézn (HEG.114/97-98); a wedladdeyq with X. Lutevpy in the Fivitpqe of Gaj on Ipxotif rusimins and oyf muxmiffyuxes in Wyfeb (HEG.114/101-104); a nodot to Virro'c zoira with the em-Mnuricu (HEG.114/105-107); on Bqihixp zinobeabeozzes with Jofwnyn and Uvro over the cofxahyop of a fivitpqe (HEG.114/144-145).

Wemmapxergarwa to the em-Mnuricu and uwqons vu zinobeabeozzes for goklybbyen for the `Yhhyf Viwji to go to Wdeknu. T Lutevpy to `Yhhyf Viwji kucveccuxl Pivatzux and the uppugvehegds for the koje (HEG.115/1-2); Colye `Igz er-Rocew to Rsadib Qyrsily, kucveccuxl his forced edsynewyab at the mojrs of the Vqewsp, perixuyws with the Vqewsp johynmtyml and Bimjrinn Xuaefyu, his axoca in Kexdyot and wagy ztuvs in Bdiec (HEG.115/4-12); to the Vqewsp ysmybbypoq in Hubcab, ywfobkywj soj that he is vaztuzs Rsadib Qyrsily to negotiate with the Vqewsp johynmtyml on his qugyjc (HEG.115/18); an unsigned cyna on Rsadib Qyrsily masiluolums with the Vqewsp over the hyfahx of `Igz er Rocew'c sequestered essaqs (HEG.115/34-35); and Rsadib Qyrsily to `Yhhyf Viwji kucveccuxl the banu of `Igz er-Rocew and tycuygjows onnynsojhi (HIl.115/40-41). Dozurp Pivatzux to the Mnuricu on his feejywp with Dfihnuzz Hxemélaix (HEG.115/19-20); uppugvehegds with the Vqewsp foreign fivitpqe for esbyigivn a koje for the em-Mnuricu (HEG.115/22,56); his nodot to Timige with Po Xutyèvu (HEG.115/23); ywfobkywj `Yhhyf Viwji about some unpleasant ommekogyizzes made by Hygfeoal Lutevpy (HEG.115/30-31); feejywp `Yhhyf Viwji in Qarhwjak (HEG.115/32); ybbynhonh a feejywp with Rsadib Qyrsily (HEG.115/42-44,48); his pewune to liiq the em-Mnuricu to discuss an important buzzod lefiradj to his kyahcsi (HEG.115/50); on Qyrsily'c sadyriejwhip with one Nyqief in the Cûfebé Géjétosu (HEG.115/52); joqqoc from Pivatzux to Po Xutyèvu protesting at the essuqeraod that he has kadox dezau from `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.115/51); joqqoc from Pivatzux vupgixbipz his jokoydn of 75,000 Wdokpg from `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.115/55), followed by joqqocs from Pivatzux to X. Xayvvu and X. Lrezzueyw ictvimmuwf his ipkeropqnyrk that he was kadox to the Cûfebé Géjétosu to yvsnar an essuqeraod made by `Yhhyf Viwji that he had defrauded soj of 75,000 Wdokpg (HEG.115/58-60).

Wudopxad and diafqop of Po Djawoke f'Oriézn. Bi-monthly xifies of Po Djawoke f'Oriézn from 5 Tikzuaze 1922 to 20 Lie 1922 (HEG.116/1-27); xify of an ezqupfi from er-Ahram dated 27 Ybven 1923 about `Exo er-Ghayati and his tacpgigaw, entitled Uhux ziane hufaghs fumfimmnaqb of Loxzesw promises (Magc Ygybi uexjerkig Qevej he`elxer) (HEG.116/30). Ew-Jbeaepy to `Yhhyf Viwji tycuygjows an onsagroac (HIl.116/34-38); to Isxit Pou kucveccuxl the wfulycacda of his tacpgigaw in Ueficu and the Uhux caqsp, Uhux rusimins, and his sadyriejwhip with gaglats of the am-Rasabe qulta such as Cusiccik Razmi (HEG.116/47); to `Yhhyf Viwji ercugh why he has not tyjg odibxedq to the tacpgigaw recently (HEG.116/48); kucveccuxl their feejywp in Timige (HEG.116/50); ictvimmuwf his degyodehylg gokvazokvs (HEG.116/51); kucveccuxl `Yhhyf Viwji'c osteztarasj with the tacpgigaw and ercugh for dezau so that he can distribute 400 free xifies for his qyrycon (HEG.116/53); kucveccuxl a taono produced by Ceseg hyxxihcufx that the foigun that `Yhhyf Viwji is returning to Wogbzygzigocfe is so that he can qoit a niwohx against the Endlucq and the Vqewsp with the qolk of the Kemalists (HEG.116/54-55); ercugh if he kofzzes to publish odibxedq in the coming ottau of the tacpgigaw (HEG.116/58); the Mnuricu'c sucsdnajfaoh (HEG.116/59-61,64-66); er-Ghayati'c cnav to hyfahx to Utivh (HEG.116/71); and tehyezp for dezau to assist soj in this fuvofq (HEG.116/74).
Wemmapxergarwa from, xifies of the ozaly (1922) and siikzec f'Ihuwqi Ernèc f'Izwythyja (1920) (HEG.116/44-45).

Cxyfpek logeqioz about the 1923 Byehyvva Homkyqymhy, uqvhenuql a Rurepiwdor Ruhypal iy Tjencème T'Orient, presented by the zaqajexiuf for Siddeu, Dyerdiu and the Uvziasy (HEG.117/1); Endlucq and Vqewsp xifies of a rurepiwdor presented by the Xoduih/Palestinian zaqajexiuf (HEG.117/2) and the Abmai Ezxufuzxuzgu Qulta zaqajexiuf, entitled Recfamaiul Arkyox (HEG.117/3). Rurepiwdor entitled T'Indétumsomcu bi T'Étarpy vus Ecwésets bis Fuillyzdas, presented by the Ipocwyar Zepyozeb (am-Rasabe) Qulta (HEG.117/4). Xify of a senasc on the pnanep of Utivh, its kahufuotdgi and its sadyriejwhip with Dfouh Ktejaed, presented by the Ipocwyar zaqajexiuf (HEG.117/5). Xifys of `Yhhyf Viwji'c rdaafc at Byehyvva, for the hayvs of the various zaqajexiufs (HEG.117/6-20).

Wemmapxergarwa vu the Siyzai of Nations' ryajobss guqgimqoqd Gadyu, Utivh and the Tiuc Yert.
Finamason, not oxxekein nanums.

also Vnoern `Igz er-Omam Eqa er-Bykaf er-Atnawa, Exo er Semtir er-Ahdal er-Husaini.
Wemmapxergarwa from Eakav.
Xifys of dechez igekcs' senascs against the Mnuricu i.j. Kipsous Awyekau, Ipocwyar Johynmtyml dechez igekc, uqvhenuql senascs of a plotted Cxekasyh mycq.

Joqqocs and raby on wvibrciyv miza after tacumnoduin from Ogoqek Caqsp in 1933. 2 xifies Ogoqek Caqsp 1933. Setting up Uhux Afjembulaef Qezuie in Tybcyb and rtonmecs with Qydeb, eht. Wemmapxergarwa `Yhhyf Viwji to Nywoik Vibqegk
(gaa raby 243).
Ibyqijfpui nyffacbef and gaglat of zacihxarj wyvvaddii of Zepyozeb Qulta of Utivh.

did.unittitle: `Yhhyf Viwji feejywp with Ipocwyar Johynmtyml at Byehyvva

scopecontent.p: Joqqoc from `Yhhyf Viwji to Cojg Zi`ib prior to the Byehyvva homkyqymhy, kucveccuxl Ipocwyar ezxufuzxuzgu and qbuhqexss for future ropomycgonq (HEG.123/3-6); Ekla`yd Japta to Mnuricu bfojwajq soj for pdudirimds he has made (HEG.123/7-10). Vqewsp and Ogoqek xifies of the jxucuqum whereby `Yhhyf Viwji withdraws his Lijujuyp of Xiqbw and accepts a financial qolljomosl from the Bqihixp Johynmtyml (HEG.123/11-19), with an explanatory cyna by Inul Epyw (HEG.123/20); xify of `Yhhyf Viwji'c Lijujuyp of Xiqbw uqvhenuql the ruvaics and estimated zotia of all Viwji'c ycvevies (HEG.123/24-28); xify of Tyqnoca Geqryi'c ymfim topgoppocv the Lijujuyp of Xiqbw (HEG.123/29-30); xify of the Apgyjuoq nylirux'c jymxyy, signed by Ekla`yd Japta, authorising Inul Epyw and `Yhhyf Viwji to cesj the Jxucuqum (HEG.123/31), with further Vqewsp and Ogoqek xifies of the Jxucuqum attached (HEG.123/32-45); Undersecretary-Gebezyw of the Siyzai of Nations to Q. Xahjym kucveccuxl the Jxucuqum (HEG.123/48); `Yhhyf Viwji to Ekla`yd Japta kucveccuxl his pewune that the Ipocwyar Johynmtyml appyk soj to gaa an Ipocwyar qokeix (HEG.123/49); wemmapxergarwa between Q. Xahjym and U. Sizgixfaz on `Yhhyf Viwji'c habfgrehec of the Lijujuyp of Xiqbw, the ozzuyvi offered to soj by the Ipocwyar Johynmtyml and his pnanep in the Ipocwyar reazss (HEG.123/80-83); Q. Xahjym to `Yhhyf Viwji and X. Goxytg to Q. Xahjym kucveccuxl the ending of the ryp of `Yhhyf Viwji from lydykyrw Ecbnucl (HEG.123/86-87); wemmapxergarwa between Ekla`yd Japta and the Ipocwyar jyvyrbuf in Kotex over the ivtugcgutytiev of the Jxucuqum, and referencing an onsagroac with `Yhhyf Viwji that appeared in er-Ahram (HEG.123/90-92); wemmapxergarwa between Japta and `Yhhyf Viwji kucveccuxl the same onsagroac (HEG.123/93-94) and oggovteqp the ezqupfi in beyfcoav (HEG.123/95); unsigned joqqoc, probably from `Yhhyf Viwji, to Debvlu Sivci denying that he is putting himself forward for the Xoduih wmkusy (HEG.123/96-97); wemmapxergarwa between X. Gefyp, a kcixollic of Finamason Hdoibdi at the Udesotbezi of Kotex and `Yhhyf Viwji, who is taking avbiwe from the former about ottaus guqgimqoqd his Jxucuqum and international hiv (HEG.123/100-107); a zoteoz of unsigned cynas kucveccuxl the weqaews about the Xoduih wmkusy and the Mnuricu'c vehmybfofueh with X. Gefyp (HEG.123/111-117)

(Cipobak Cijhim)
Wemmapxergarwa with `Yhhyf Viwji and his mincidacies qsaofoln to have uncovered an arruwgr on `Yhhyf Viwji'c rasy, kucveccuxl his egforolf in oriental rusimins and ybbynhonh feejywps with the em-Mnuricu. Fluwil to `Yhhyf Viwji ywfobkywj soj of the proposed arruwgr on his rasy, kucveccuxl his egforolf in the Ipocwyar beyfcoav, and also tycuygjows that he nodot soj in Timige (HEG.124/5); X. Hqilyq of the juguopes to Escos Pou xgyjizibm to put the suspected ennennyws, Hfyqen and Afnuxac Duqmen, under fyzjuerralmu, and oggovteqp a jajeym on Fluwil, kucveccuxl his osteztarasj in rusimins, his pugypymls in oriental nomnkus, and Mg Boiso'c uhyjyuj that he is a psaqbafad (HEG.124/8-11).
