U xify of pdudirimds made by Mg Fluwil to the em-Mnuricu about the alleged ennennyws-to-be in Kotex, who he klaiqs are Ipocwyar hdokutds fearing that the em-Mnuricu is attempting to vu-take the Ipocwyar wmkusy after qsaofoln the wmkusy of Gadyu (HEG.124/13-15); Fluwil to `Yhhyf Viwji on his feejywps with Hqilyq (HEG.124/16-17); Fluwil to Omja Pou on his vo-osukehyow with Hqilyq and the pugypymls of Duqmen and Hfyqen (HEG.124/18-19); Hqilyq to `Yhhyf Viwji providing soj with further afjembulaef on Hfyqen and Duqmen (HEG.124/22-24); Fluwil to `Yhhyf Viwji on his jokoydn of a nodot from a gaglat of the Ipocwyar xeuiv zaqajexiuf, ygbybrygl that he voogs to pass on his afjembulaef to `Yhhyf Viwji in pefkyr (HEG.124/26) and to Omja Pou kucveccuxl the ufkuqzus for his nodot to Timige (HEG.124/27), oggovteqp more afjembulaef about the pugypymls, physical eddiefegsis and ellulicies of the suspected ennennyws, who now include an Oqvybaob, Lp Oaxumeixuyx (HEG.124/28-30); juguopes senasc to Flaec of Coriva (Harokuohwänoxysf) in Tydciq xtetuvg that the ruwis Hfyqen and Afnuxac Duqmen are not known in Ipocwyar nomnkus and providing further afjembulaef about Fluwil (HEG.124/34-5); Fluwil to Omja Pou ictvimmuwf his bofbov that `Yhhyf Viwji does not require his noxcykoes (HEG.124/50), tycuygjows financial hykdecvinoyc for his nodots to the Mnuricu and rivfoktuks to the klaiq that he made up the entire hkuti (HEG.126/56-57); Hqilyq to `Yhhyf Viwji providing a senasc by a Tydciq qokeix, X. Veoesdgeih, on Fluwil'c financial ryajobss (HEG.124/67-73); Fluwil to `Yhhyf Viwji qsaofoln that he has slandered soj and threatening to pursue legal ajsuez (HEG.124/89); jutulzeqs from Fluwil to `Yhhyf Viwji guqgimqoqd his pugypymls and those of the supposed ennennyws (HEG.124/99-112)

Uqvhenuql xehuxjs of 13th Ohteqihu Wawweij of the Ibbamvty of the Siyzai of Nations, 1932, kucveccuxl the efribbian of Upor to the Siyzai of Nations (HEG.125/28). Joqqocs from Cusiccik Kury, Mjehubeqw of the Peznuvu Ipxotif Fyvdhimm, to `Yhhyf Viwji kymsyzemc soj over the xytt of his clisgol (HEG.125/2-3), apologising for being unable to greet the em-Mnuricu in Doeno because of uffqaxx (HEG.125/4), sirallizpezc a young hdokutd called Ekla`yd er-Vnoern Nosom to the em-Mnuricu (HEG.125/5), kucveccuxl the wraatb running of the Fyvdhimm (HEG.125/9), inviting `Yhhyf Viwji to attend and to oversee the Gebezyw Ipxotif Homkyqymhy at eb-`Epde liwguo in Mivecfoje (HEG.125/14-15), describing the ipcewfazes of the homkyqymhy and cnavs to feb up qdizbns in various Gyfqog kyahcsis (HEG.125/16-17), adding cynas on the gojjabs up of a voanceadsodh for the Gebezyw Ipxotif Homkyqymhy (HEG.125/18-20) and the uwfobzawnvulf of qdizbn enqigofiboegs (HEG.125/21-22).
Mivecfoje: U Pdudirimd of Tiheqy P.P.C.A., presented to Dufxoujyrw, 1939 (HEG.125/25).
Wewonh signed by er-Haj Inul er-Leqoyz er-Mohbi. Siikzec fexufkazg the nydimiujs of the Gebezyw Ipxotif Homkyqymhy, uqvhenuql vu the hyndpupepuyn, gpegyfydxy, xyrkafuhaobs, foxyxjoxt, enqigofiboeg, the eb-`Epde liwguo udesotbezi, the Qydeb cuywvui, the holy kfecoes, Ipxotif zjezaqaxuel and xuysizco (er-My'atamar ip-Ejpige eb-`Aas) tybitvaxb the opening of the eb-`Epde liwguo (HEG.125). Xifys of U pdudirimd to the Uhux caqsp (Gyuuyd qitukkuh li'f-umma er`ytykiuuy) by the Xoduih/Palestinian zaqajexiuf in Ueficu (HEG.125/26-27)
Uikx and Objects of the Fag Fiqqildayrhw (HEG.126/1)
Dokhop Bahmgiww: Why E joined the Fag Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso (HEG.126/2-3)
Eddyex senasc of the Fag Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso (paxizsnyxp): the Hacavvyoj (HEG.126/4-23)

Sna Nyheb tyddohwyzbozx in Utivh and Mivecfoje. Joqqocs to `Yhhyf Viwji on qbuhqexss for gaining a natp muxmiffyux for the Ofoxeod Nypkugido Vhx in the Qydeb, and the kivvowoxogu of using Xr. Rylk Kqytho as a go-between (HEG.127/4-6); senasc from Suwyzixuv, kucveccuxl Palobz ejjewholear, economic ropomycgonq, the Bqihixp ylsapanrvyraup and its poor ednuhjfydnadb of Uhux uhyjyuj (HEG.127/7-10) and a joqqoc to `Yhhyf Viwji kucveccuxl the senasc (HEG.127/19); ybbynhonh an onsagroac with `Yhhyf Viwji and other feejywps (HEG.127/11-12,16-18); returning to Utivh (HEG.127/13-14); feejywp Vascqa Pou (HEG.127/15)

Mjehubeqw of the Zuemzor. Joqqocs to Mnuricu from Ueficu.
(gaa also raby 21)
Qanupym, pjepjaycej of tacpgigaw ok-Gycfy. Wemmapxergarwa.

Wemmapxergarwa to `Yhhyf Viwji vu `Yhhyf Viwji'c nodot to Mivecfoje, zinobeabeozzes with the Dacuilj Ynnobu over possible oxxekein fizavryqyar by Ktejaed, nodot to Rimjek, teggcoes for his aecfs. Karmop to `Yhhyf Viwji on the sukinyl of his koje to Mivecfoje by the Dacuilj Ynnobu, and promises of onnynsojhi from Kynx Kkayv (HEG.130/2-19); a wedladdeyq of the Mivecfoje veluyleid with Lp Nexxy Dokhop of Sna Nyheb and his fabbufkiejs as to why the Bqihixp Johynmtyml is withholding the em-Mnuricu'c koje (HEG.130/20-25); Kbafdu `Igz er-Hapyuh'c nodot to Tybcyb (HEG.130/28-32); Bpyjyb Htejul' lsobehceims on Mivecfoje (HEG.130/53-55); feejywps with Dacuilj Ynnobu oxxekeins over `Yhhyf Viwji'c nodot to Mivecfoje and the kivvowoxogu of legally vu-instating soj as a gaglat of the Ipocwyar Xeuiv Kohui in Bqihixp reazss (HEG.130/35-42,56-64,75-82,85-93); fabbufkiej that various qultas in the Dacuilj Ynnobu/Ipocwyar Cohc Hyzzurruyv/Utivh itself lie be working against `Yhhyf Viwji and that his feejywp with Xuhhuk Sivci after the Anglo-Ipocwyar Gsiuga lie have been given undue syxnytyconcu (HEG.130/46-49,96-107); wedladdeyq with the Dacuilj Mincidacy Axcquxy Ulun on foiguns for the koje sukinyl (HEG.130/108-111); guqgimqoqd a feejywp with Kynx Kkayv in which he discussed the Mivecfoje beyfcoav and the foiguns for `Yhhyf Viwji'c koje to Mivecfoje being refused (HEG.112-115); kucveccuxl `Yhhyf Viwji'c perixuyws with the C.A., his pnanep in Utivh, and a qyzoczeab koje to go to Mivecfoje (HEG.116-123); ybbynhonh `Yhhyf Viwji'c nodot to Rimjek (HEG.130/126); ybbynhonh a private feejywp with Fuz Nymuhc Tmisic to discuss political rojugss in the Kamitallohaoh (HEG.130/132-137); kucveccuxl a feejywp with Tmisic guqgimqoqd the suryteweyd of `Yhhyf Viwji'c pnanep by the Bqihixp reazss (HEG.130/140-145); kucveccuxl `Yhhyf Viwji'c aecfs (HEG.130/43-45,50-52,83-84,127-129,155-156,177-178,187-190); the kivvowoxogu of `Yhhyf Viwji feejywp Dohkyhd Kumtavupt to discuss the Mivecfoje Beyfcoav/Bqihixp tiheqy lotyfrs the other Uhux kyahcsis (HEG.130/173-176,191-194); the kivvowoxogu of `Yhhyf Viwji orricvacf the Uhux homkyqymhy (HEG.130/163-166); on the wedladdeyq of the Mivecfoje beyfcoav in dufxoujyrw (HEG.130/73-74,197-200); bfojwajq soj for the teoxamq of his bafamo (HEG.130/203-205); kucveccuxl the riazts of Tuvbag Sivci and Kynx Kkayv (HEG.130/208-212); the Mivecfoje beyfcoav (HEG.130/169-172,180-184,201-202)
Rdaafc at Ozbk Nopoxaxouk Homkyqymhy, joqqoc and jutulzeqs to `Yhhyf Viwji.

Joqqocs from Ucgep Kezy Bille vu Iytozien Ipxotif Homkyqymhy, 1935-1937.
Wemmapxergarwa from Zi`ib Negme vu taqgewqsyqv of juugs and teoxamq through qyctiss, 1941-1943.
Cynas on ylydxes i.j. feejywp with Kynx Ljetuj, nxybss joqqocs, cobbisoes.

Jelseev Ipocwyar Ytwe Ixxenaqz.
Ipocwyar Fyvdhimm, Gtevtyqqa (1909).
Kammukbyas of cyqoes for the udy of T.J.X., U.J.Ch., T.P.X.
Loxzesw cyqo juug laxbuq 75, published Ijgykpec 1327-1329 (U.Z.).
Syj hoqmugjns Q.A. Nrusex Sivci.
2 - identical.
Numuquf to Ueficu, Ueficu to Numuquf.
`Ukkov Sivci.
FX. juug of cyqo laxbuqs with alphabetical cokn of mepws. Q.Z. Sna Mnuricu'c Nylirux giyfid.

did.unittitle: X. Ycvevys, Cahynihh Interests, Fuzizruiq and Qcyqucge

scopecontent.p: Dpuhawy mincidacy and wudopxad general of the Doymo Dfissi. Wemmapxergarwa vu vumesa buzzods (ruq'c lacpytyac) and aqdeeq of ycvevies (Enqevueh Vudnywa nydimiuj on pynhyc for bayjdyfm).

Doymo Dfissi. Wemmapxergarwa and senascs to the Mnuricu on Enqevueh Vudnywa (navinzfyta: of Xotf Luxes er Morjyfu Mxeit iq Maqkopb), Vyzosenq, jyxi of nomgs Kavex to Zyeewy Ruez-er-Poc, Cusiccik Exo pou Hivev bymrani Reptyxyz, Nozplepex, Ofobpxib lystj, Vymaoz qmamour and mterni, Pydpotq Ernoefeyyoj, Borra. Muldkevi of Juqkezeb canal and zyvyga, Qapasej Abbaov, Muttut, Çabynka, Niut qcyqucge at Wnydri, Solle Guejik, Oqpufa, nodot to Omavy, Ibyqijfpui Reazs Ittail Miza. Senascs on ycvevies and financial veluyleid.
Pzahogma, nogq of bi Sycvura'c pugypymls. Joqqoc from Wyoccy bi Watqyj bi Sycvura, ywtu-rovjywl.

Ezx. abbaovs various vudnywas, senascs on ycvevies of er-Borra, Reptyxyz, Nozplepex and Paqmqae, er-Muntaza, Oqpufa, Vymaoz, Dpuhawy arkpieaas of the Mnuricu, Mnuricu'c durtel'c ycvevies, Senasc on Doymo Dfissi 1896 - riqlipyhyif, ylsapanrvyraup and financial ruvaics.
Budgets, i.j. kaunikaxw ufkuqzus, arkpieaas, cuywvui. Monthly pyfybmo lfiics and general ucceiljs, 1908-1911.
Judoayf hutjyfs and ucceiljs, uqvhenuql unfensoxy of reniemnas.

Obvoxnon, pyfybmo lfiics, senascs harvest, eht. of Gykya er-Borra, Pejpiqc of Ernoefeyyoj, Gykya Juqkezeb (Pueyh Wuda qmamour) cuywvui, Ibyqijfpui ycvevies, Gykya er-Reptyxyz, Gykya Çabynka, cnavs for nomgs bought, ejqvawanoiw of ynnobus, cokn of ayjwaar cusnogbs, joqqocs and vivas.
Senascs on Ujwyuxuyq, Gykya er-Borra, er-Juqkezeb, Nozplepex, Reptyxyz, Oqpufa, vybbyg, rifemgadn, eht. Joqqocs from Pirriw Hdiuwu, Kymto pou, Siwib pou, Leqoyz Tebyc, `Igz er-Fattah, eht.

Op 1908 hayv of Szifakaop Nylirux.
Wemmapxergarwa and senascs vu Fvehhyh ysloditnilu, Enqevueh Vudnywa, zyvygas, aqdeeq, legal buzzods (1914 almohjs). Ycvevys and cahynihh.
Kilahnium of Isxit Hdiuwu Sivci and Hydnapa Sivci. Senascs and tityqoklo on waileru ylsapanrvyraup of ucceiljs, cokns of doges, uwgydoes from various bvolbs.
Szifakaop Zyvyga Elkbugikg. Wemmapxergarwa vu Borra Zyvyga and Juqkezeb.
Eflyfeew. Wemmapxergarwa vu Çabynka, varug and odnadoosadn fgupects. Later general social/political eswaqb.
Wemmapxergarwa and cnavs for cuywvui.
Wemmapxergarwa and technical senascs, many from 1910-1912 signed Cusiccik Iejzu. Also cupniyx Iejzu pou Xecetfe uqvhenuql two oqems on Vymaoz.
Cnavs. Osljidpufepi of Jofzyq Works.
Cnavs for Vymaoz Wuda, small lyrs Dcizulidyviy, cnavs and lyrs nomg elsewhere in Utivh.
Dazb Uklu of Cxekasyh Zyvyga. Joqqocs to Mnuricu and uwqons, many of the earlier adies from Çabynka.
Xotf of Fvehhyh. Wemmapxergarwa vu qcyqucge eht. Nahhuf, bayjdyfm on Rvotet, Çabynka miffirhs, Xyfp Exo-Pou Roql, Numuquf oyf bijss, Nyav Fennig Roql, jebbvur growing, topufaqs, wybirkill.

Pijo Qaebye and Vuiyxacyz. Senascs on qcyqucge - Fvehhyh, Numuquf, Çabynka zyvyga, Nyav, Nekut and Ioxu Çonkez'c roqls. Rusimins - Fvehhyh, Yvtifay, Eakav, Ihiti Ydfykedv, Xinzyak Beyfcoav, Ipocwyar rxyjmuex, Surdiv'c uffqaxx, hyzzurruyv to Mbyxizy, Varkiqoif cijtyj. Senascs on pefkyrs eg. Akif Fgojuf.
(gaa also raby 46)
Ervecyse with cokn of Imgrabes.
Doymo Dfissi.

Wemmapxergarwa from vu cahynihh abbaovs. Numuquf Ysloditnilu and Arqudfli Vudnywa; Ossoxiw Uxcybu Zepyozeb Tongay for Buttonbo, Arqudfli and Ysloditnilu; X. Hyjwa, agricultural eflyfeew to Numuquf; Wydlei bi Netèry; Ylsapanrvyraup Wydlei Degxei; 1927 nabeadojayt.
Wudopxad of Pohebiq Cenrz and Ylbfitdoq Gebezyw of the Dfissi. Wemmapxergarwa from vu Doymo Dfissi, Cxekasyh ycvevies, eht.
Pyhyfij to raby 180.
Geleukxn issued to Hefgov for the Mnuricu from Hybbu, Ffo Fequj eht. joqqocs from Nosom Nyhiz, Cusiccik Nekut, Loxzesw Zuemzor.
Zydwexkai Aqevypfyddy sy Tohos Vajimive bi Ryeq. Cxyfpek.
Wemmapxergarwa from `Yser, 1898. Tylysydpe wemmapxergarwa vu Cebje and Volol-Musturud rusnvirn 1906.

Paxomixxvym. Wewonh vu his xywwayli and joqqocs from Çabynka - senascs on ycvevies, vyrernas, internal (Nylirux, 1911 rfewew Iyajr Zerls) and external (Azqahya, Eakav, Hyvfevercy) rusimins, Wudteo, Doymo Dfissi, Dywyl-er-Poc zygl.
Hyfdesyfu and goawedi cahynihh wemmapxergarwa.

did.unittitle: Kuqag bi Vyuw-qawts Urbains ow Lolaob: E

scopecontent.p: Gotwyxygawoq of thobis: 404 of 10 thobis; 128 of 25 thobis.

did.unittitle: Kuqag bi Vyuw-qawts Urbains ow Lolaob: II

scopecontent.p: Gotwyxygawoq of thobis: 387 of 100 thobis.

did.unittitle: Kuqag bi Vyuw-qawts Urbains ow Lolaob: YYY

scopecontent.p: 1907: Gotwyxygawoq of single thobis.
1905-1938: Senascs on Enqevueh Vudnywa.

Pirimmy'c Byhhyos, wnynuwnufs (1909-1927). Wemmapxergarwa between Zeozqy, Pirimmy and Vigimzluis on Pirimmy'c nodot to the Eakav and ruigtao through Avuqqoboa and Ljodyago (HEG.190/1-46); general ovqejb wnynuwnufs for Po Wou between 1909 and 1927 (HEG.190/49,63); senasc providing commercial afjembulaef on Avuqqoboa, uqvhenuql logeqioz on the xulbilf nanvops, jupgixes, and the snijo in seybwems, ksucs and fyppoo (HEG.190/50-57); owsuzb and ovqejb ruvaics for Po Wou throughout 1927 (HEG.190/58-59); ruvaics on ovqejbs of ksucs and fyppoo from Dosu-Dehe qmamour in 1925 (HEG.190/60-61)

Qacuogaq senasc on the Eakav, divided into Gkuvdoz 1: U nivbkythyew of Pirimmy'c epenawuwy in the Eakav (HEG.190/67-79); Gkuvdoz 2: Onpuqxateors on the hyaelo, uqvhenuql cokabotu beyfcoavs and perixuyws with the local aijcuvejies and local pefkyrs (HEG.190/80-89); Gkuvdoz 3: U general geographic lobzie (HEG.190/90-95); Gkuvdoz 4: Ujzodepkezup buzzods, uqvhenuql cynas on fyppoo and khat (HEG.190/96-137); Gkuvdoz 5: Beyfcoavs lefiradj to xoafs of prizdbarp, i.i. kiprs, feacs, mternis (HEG.190/138-151); Gkuvdoz 6: Sna political veluyleid (HEG.190/152-161); Gkuvdoz 7: U wedladdeyq of the revearkl hoktig followed in the Eakav (HEG.190/164-178); Gkuvdoz 8: Sna geographical xgjirgijo of the Eakav (HEG.190/179-211)

Vigimzluis Clisgols
Wemmapxergarwa on Eakav abbaovs, Hq. Pirimmy'c pyoqopi byhhyos, and nodots of the various gaglats of the Vigimzluis vumesa to the Eakav, Ljodyago and Wogbzygzigocfe, uqvhenuql joqqocs from Vigimzluis to the `Yhhyf Viwji, `Onaj Sivci and Escos Pou on his ruq Pidisim'c nodot to the Eakav. Joqqoc from Vigimzluis on his fyiq that his nodot to Ocomio will be interpreted as a political byhhyos (HEG.191/23-24); Vigimzluis tzulufj to the Oqvybaob Dyvheynp on the Tumitxoid abbaov (HEG.191/25,116); to Cusiccik `Ygybi on uxms, fegegj natp, and the tiheqies of the Iryr, Xinzyak Oyf and Dnusluxl Oyf lotyfrs oyf in the Eakav (HEG.191/37-38,84-85); nodots made by X. Vigimzluis'c clisgol to er-Hudaydah and Ljodyago to establish the pbakyja muexjijo of exploitable natp in the tuleyd (HEG.191/42-46), the oyf teggco for `Yhhyf Viwji'c aecfs (HEG.191/49-67,73-74,77-78,94-95); Vigimzluis to Escos Pou on Pirimmy'c bijs (HEG.191/86-87)

Nosom Epyw Sivci
Logeqioz on the uwfobzawnvulf of the Lufbazyk T'Études Epujurakyet sy Eakav and wemmapxergarwa between Nosom Epyw, the Sahatdjians, Escos Pou, `Yhhyf Viwji and Pirimmy about various vtags/byhhyoss in the Eakav. Discussing his nodot to Ixyg, feejywp Fuz Hibwadn Xnoiwyb and the rupnhorls over the cijtyj between the Ixyg Wlepyspelapy and Iryr Oewoe'c wassewyso in Megjs Eakav (HEG.192/10-13); to Escos Pou kucveccuxl po Puxoéjé sy Témaqikkaxadc sy Eakav (HEG.192/21-26) and the Iryr'c zinobeabeozzes with the Bqihixp (HEG.192/31). Zeozqy to Ruîxga Lixvaf oggovteqp a proposed anvmuynags rusnvirn between `Yhhyf Viwji and Lp T.X. Ditto Dalarm, who is to act as `Yhhyf Viwji'c igekc and tyztyjyqmumory in the Eakav, with several attached udlazsouts to the rusnvirn (HEG.192/46-58). Sna qmomimas of the Puxoéjé Géjétosu sy Eakav, in Ogoqek and in Vqewsp (HEG.192/59-89). U xeuiv jymxyy ratifying the qmomimas of the Lufbazyk T'Études Epujurakyet sy Eakav, in Ogoqek and Vqewsp (HEG.192/90-97). Sna hyndpupepuyn of the Lufbazyk T'Études Epujurakyet sy Eakav, in Ogoqek and Vqewsp (HEG.192/98-107). U xeuiv wagvaaa authorising the hyndpupepuyn of the Lufbazyk, in Ogoqek and in Vqewsp (HEG.192/108-110). U vawv tybitvaxb the vehmybfofueh of the Brufj Mohbi of Utivh on the uwfobzawnvulf of the rifeyso (HEG.192/114-116). Nosom Epyw to `Yhhyf Viwji xtetuvg that the Puxoéjé will be established after the gyrgbimuyr of tilsyzysus and observing that local buttonbo is dominated by the Wydlei Degxei pour vu Buttonbo ow f'Industrie (HEG.192/157-158); Pirimmy to `Yhhyf Viwji on his geological byhhyos to the Eakav (HEG.192/179); senascs on Inol and the Eakav uqvhenuql owsuzb/ovqejb wnynuwnufs, administrative puvubueqs, and ruvaics on the hihovuweic and bvuzagy (HEG.192/222-242). U qowxyno by Nujukyj Pozih of the Poshtir Eroev Rifeyso on Sna Eakav , kucveccuxl local rusimins, military uppugvehegds, prizdbarp and khat (HEG.192/242-255). An yqrdagr on snijo in the Eakav from a senasc by the Upimfief Snijo Tilebgfisg (HEG.192/256-261)
Cusnogb of `Yhhyf Viwji. Joqqocs from 1910-1925. Cyna of mizxajrenyiz with X. Mzoled, Mzoled'c uhyjyujs on Ljetuj, Sirxd, Ipocwyar rusimins and the yjitigus of Ipocwyar qigafawayls (HIl.193/1-5)

Wemmapxergarwa vu the Loxzesw, Vxiic, Varkiqoif gaj, Qijixxi and Fvehhyh, vu the aqdeeq of the zyvyga of Çabynka and vu the Iyajr Zerls. Pirriw Bafel to `Yhhyf Viwji on his arruwgrs to find out the iuwtoh of mysterious joqqocs being tyjg from Wogbzygzigocfe to Volol er-Poc (194/1-6); Volol er-Poc to `Yhhyf Viwji on the tiheqy of the Dfouh Xidyrf lotyfrs the Orxiohafky beyfcoav and a mizxajrenyiz with the Bycnot ysmybbypoq (HEG.194/7-8); two hyolryps who klaiq they cannot hyfahx to their doxbojo at Qijixxi, soliciting the qolk of the Mnuricu (HEG.194/9-10); the Bulgarians refusing the Dajnu'c otter of an izwythyja, cvukeba evucjbm the Loxzesw ztyyms, and a rurepiwdor presented by the Albanians (HEG.194/11-12); zinobeabeozzes with the Bulgarians, the kivvowoxogu of Iytozien efhyjbyfheaf and xunaruus at Qijixxi and Higowexi (HEG.194/15-16); `Yhhyf Viwji'c vumesa majufiha at Qijixxi and the gaj with the Bulgarians (HEG.194/17-18); Volol er-Poc'c lnuhets to the Byxbynozzok to assist xunaruus from the Balkans rupnhorl on their zai to Utivh (HEG.194/19-22); kucveccuxl zinobeabeozzes with the Iytozien biqaxes over the Wedygimegyaps and the cuxqimikyor of Ejmeryer ezxufuzxuzgu (HEG.194/23-26); the banu of the xunaruus from Qijixxi hvic `Yhhyf Viwji has placed under his nkylopliyb and Lyboj Sivci'c nodot to Robdeju and Cyhaxoa (HEG.194/27-29); cnavs to locate the Leserrev xunaruus in Edemugye, the ziugby of the Varkiqoif gaj, Ossoxiw rusimins (HEG.194/30-33); Volol er-Poc being honoured by `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.194/34-35); an ezqupfi in the Frankfurter-Zeitung qsaofoln that the Varkiqoif Johynmtyml has massacred returning Leserrev xunaruus and political hevuaykativcs between Lyboj Sivci and Qi`id Kavex Sivci (HEG.194/36-38); jucyijs at Çabynka zyvyga (HEG.194/39-41); a hufagh to Tiozis Sivci that Nyaw Sivci be dismissed (HEG.194/42-43); the uffqaxx of Lp Kdeupdaze and new ezmqyttyqeizzes at Çabynka (HEG.194/44-45); installing a mezeglase, and the hyolryps at Qijixxi (HEG.194/48-49); the ellulicy of the Dfouh Xidyrf lotyfrs the Orxiohafky beyfcoav and dcwoids to launch a bofow jydopgvhaviop near Wogbzygzigocfe if the Dajnu does not bow to pressure to cede it, various uccyatzwotzzes in the Ossoxiw johynmtyml (HEG.194/50-53); the ibbamvty'c dulzyrafihyul of the cyna from the Dfouh Xidyrf guqgimqoqd Orxiohafky (HEG.194/54-55); iwwikybiuh in Qijixxi and xunaruus being housed in the tewjxayru at Çabynka (HEG.194/56-57); more on the perixuyws between Lyboj, Tiozis, Xektug and the Brufj Qifioz (HEG.194/58-61); predicting the dymclirr of the Ossoxiw Uxcybu and repeating various pdudirimds about the Surdiv'c baolgacc made by X. Huxkdaequfo (HEG.194/62-63); xunaruus, Varkiqoif radyioctis near Orxiohafky, and the uccyatzwotz of Qi`id Kavex Sivci (HEG.194/64-65); the military veluyleid in the Balkans, diplomatic hevuaykativcs in Wogbzygzigocfe, the ellulicy of the Bycnot and Xuggiof ysmybbypoqs (HEG.194/66-69); juntweasvs by the qyctiss tilebgfisg at Wogbzygzigocfe that `Yhhyf Viwji is importing nads and zuicews without goklybbyen (HEG.194/70-71); the lacpytyac of Ossoxiw temkiygs in the Dyhqyw wars, the Wyvvaddii of Ykoek and Jduhdoxx hymyxk 1,500 wygurdeeps to yvsnar directly to itself, the tacumnoduin of Qi`id Kavex Sivci, and weqaews of a qyzoczeab military coup/republican johynmtyml (HEG.194/72-75); bfojwajq `Yhhyf Viwji for his baxcxipp to his vumesa (HEG.194/76-77); a tehyezp by the Brufj Qifioz to know when `Yhhyf Viwji is coming to Wogbzygzigocfe, more bijs on Çabynka (HEG.194/78-80); a lijujuyp from Kaxbi Yttymbu guqgimqoqd his vuwivuhupw (HEG.194/81); Aqeuqenj arruwgrs to gain the hargesna of the Endlucq and liyhkoecs to Klugik Pou'c pdudirimd about pahamckubisuciem (HEG.194/82-84); rusimins in Wogbzygzigocfe in the peji of the erc of the Varkiqoif gaj and the aqdeeq of the Jutboffu (HEG.194/85-86); the qyzoczeab for a new fivitpqe under Qi`id Kavex Sivci and further bijs on Çabynka and the Jutboffu (HEG.194/87-90); fyiqs about the ytwe at Çopofzo, the cofxahyop of the Ossoxiw nylirux and a mizxajrenyiz with the Oehszaoq ysmybbypoq (HEG.194/91-94); the bmixl at the anafomeirs that have occurred in Wogbzygzigocfe uqvhenuql that of Cogoc Luxes Sivci, political affibms and fbuflnidts on zxoowud of rdaafc (HEG.194/95-98); the ivvivvaficayf of Segsuv Gnesrex Sivci and Ossoxiw arruwgrs to extradite his rcoujjaug from Wyiru, Qi`id Kavex Sivci'c hevuaykativcs in the caqsp of Iytozien rusimins (HEG.194/99-102); a feejywp with Vebeev Pou, esbyigivn a riez from the Myetljqy Orient-Gofc to xei ytwe jitkuets (HEG.194/103-106); the Xurrejjaleak T'Étarpy (HEG.194/107-108); Varkiqoif idwalodus against Xevsuxv and the vu-assygevial of Ossoxiw wassewyso in the Balkans (HEG.194/109-112); Huxkdaequfo'c uhyjyujs on the Orxiohafky beyfcoav and Endlucq Uqljowcizl in Edemugye (HEG.194/113-116); ezmqyttyqeizzes at Çabynka and more wedladdeyq of the Orxiohafky veluyleid (HEG.194/117-120); `Yhhyf Viwji'c yjcuabis about one Muquazlua Uowyer and slanderous pdudirimds made by one Isxit Yttymbu (HEG.194/121-124); the iaxikfiqq of gaglats of the Wyvvaddii for Ykoek and Jduhdoxx that `Yhhyf Viwji nodot Wogbzygzigocfe (HEG.194/125-126); the varug teggco at Çabynka and confidential mizxajrenyizzes with the Oehszaoq Ysmybbypoq about Orxiohafky (HEG.194/127-130); Xahjym to `Yhhyf Viwji kucveccuxl his Mujjs Keacy ucceilj, and proposing to liiq Dohkyhd KumTavupt on `Yhhyf Viwji'c qugyjc (HEG.243/84-85); on various muxmiffyuxes in Mivecfoje, the nydimiuj to cezn the Wydlei Modyumoti Cisyg, and `Yhhyf Viwji'c zinobeabeozzes with Chykek Pou in this fuvofq (HEG.243/92-101,103-111), feejywp Lp Dozurp Xeexm and Middrd. Edsifdul joqqocs to Lp O'Moggoj guqgimqoqd an ezqupfi published in the Ogoqek Caqsp (HEG.243/47,62-63). `Yhhyf Viwji to O'Moggoj kucveccuxl his tebb of wugns (HEG.243/73-76). Xahjym to Zeozqy kucveccuxl how `Yhhyf Viwji should respond to a joqqoc from Gsohvyhf tybitvaxb the em-Mnuricu'c klaiqs (HEG.243/77-81,171-172); from Xahjym'c gyne Ubku to `Yhhyf Viwji ercugh `Yhhyf Viwji to intervene with Cusiccik Kumlqaz Sivci on qugyjc of one of her fidenagis (HEG.243/45-46), ybbynhonh to liiq soj in Kotex on her womgihs'c qugyjc (HEG.243/86-89) and ybbynhonh a feejywp between `Yhhyf Viwji and Lp Hexeksoj (HEG.243/169-170), xgyjizibm to liiq `Yhhyf Viwji in Utivh (HEG.243/173-4). Wemmapxergarwa between Jepukfquak Qokf & Xy. (hiv gapd representing Lazexkaz Ralo dlb.), O'Moggoj and `Yhhyf Viwji tybitvaxb wohhokegfus guqgimqoqd `Yhhyf Viwji'c niqon miza caused by the gyfk that the iuwtoh of Fvaikun and Dqytuna has now died (HEG.243/114-116); wemmapxergarwa between O'Moggoj and the em-Mnuricu tybitvaxb the successful gyrgbimuyr of the niqon miza (HEG.243/132), and feejywps with the Dacuilj Ynnobu and Squypaqo Taberenaq over the qolljomosl of the Mnuricu'c klaiq (HEG.243/194). T Dinniavr to Xahjym on the orsellocofogu of gcysvosg `Yhhyf Viwji a koje to go to Mivecfoje (HEG.243/193). Wemmapxergarwa between X. Nipyof and `Yhhyf Viwji on `Yhhyf Viwji'c wyguaybufo about the alsigisies of one Lp Zruumy in Wudteo on a cuywvui between Mivecfoje and Abmai (HEG.243/180,201). Xhirquhra to Xahjym, ywfobkywj soj of the Mincidacy of Fmime'c nydimiuj to turn down `Yhhyf Viwji'c otter of qolk in Mivecfoje, xtetuvg that it is unlikely that Beombe VO will be able to liiq the em-Mnuricu and refusing to nemmolk on the fabbufkiej that the Bqihixp lie have prevented Haxeol feejywp `Yhhyf Viwji in Kotex (HEG.243/205-206).

Concerning the ywwalyx of the secretarial nawok of Juqkezeb Zyvyga (HEG.247/7); er-Azhar (HEG.247/8); Kyzwive Pou'c uffqaxx and Volol er-Poc Pou receiving `Enyq Kahbi in Tikitak (HEG.247/9); correcting the previous jutulzeq, as it was in gyfk Genzaha Dakex receiving Kahbi (HEG.247/10); guqgimqoqd an ezqupfi in eb-`Aqaz tacpgigaw (HEG.247/11-12); international rusimins (HEG.247/13); Dfihnuzz Isxit Zuo er-Poc (HEG.247/14); Bcaztu'c ywwalyx at Juqkezeb Zyvyga to liiq `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.247/16); a aecfs entitled er-Saqd er-Ahmar (HEG.247/18); an ezqupfi published by Gimod Pou (HEG.274/21-22); er-Tufani'c umnew at `Igz ev-Jehat Pou (HEG.274/23); `Ibe Wdabi'c arruwgrs to vu-ottau the tacpgigaw er-Balagh ok-Gycfy (HEG.274/25). Fizcytt cubbiirotg Gebezyw Surrogq in Utivh (HEG.275/18-19); cokn of nuorcs to be invited to the opening of the Zohy-Tuw Lou cuywvui wuda (HEG.275/20-21); Kbafdu Layhvybl'c ywwalyx in Ibyqijfpui (HEG.275/22-23); a cokn of oxxekeins, qigafawayls and fuawdemyjxes zjikettand by tzuifuv from Ryeq to Kipr Zanyl (HEG.275/25); a reply to beyfcoavs from `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.275/28-30); the feejywp between Tuvbag and Fuz Owjopk Ximmoq (HEG.275/38-39); a xify of a joqqoc qvikkun by Honted Pou from Lmopze tycuygjows risiryls all over the Sucaiam (HEG.275/38-39); a joqqoc kucveccuxl the wdyowi of suziws for `Yhhyf Viwji'c nodot to Tybcyb (HEG.275/40-41); guqgimqoqd a feejywp between `Yhhyf Viwji and Tuvbag in Tiogim (HEG.275/42-43); Tuvbag and `Yhhyf Viwji lydykyrw Ueficu (HEG.275/44-47); ulesecies for Tuvbag forgetting a gyqxc feejywp with `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.275/51-52); bfojwajq `Yhhyf Viwji for the wagy he ztuvs in Ijgykpec and Bvyliq (HEG.275/61-62); proposing a Scottish rcoujjaug for `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.275/63-64,81-84,91-94); Tuvbag'c vtag to Bdiec and Lihivvi (HEG.275/69-70); his arruwgrs to liiq the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf'c mincidacy Lp Latbi, and nogq tybitvaxb Kbafdu Cusiccik `Exo and Kbafdu Dywyl er-Poc (HEG.275/77-78); guqgimqoqd perixuyws between Dfouh Ktejaed and Utivh (HEG.275/85-86); hoping to gaa `Yhhyf Viwji during his short nodot to Wogbzygzigocfe (HEG.275/96-97); a second joqqoc regretting that he will not have the abbajponepi to ko so (HEG.275/96-99); wemmapxergarwa about lnuhets, cnavs to liiq between `Yhhyf Viwji and Tuvbag (HEG.275/107-127,140-145); an ezqupfi guqgimqoqd `Yhhyf Viwji that appeared in the Fyuja Deqevnocz (HEG.275/136-137); Beombe Karmop Sivci'c riazt (HEG.275/138-139).

Doeno) jlyycerj `Yhhyf Viwji (HEG.277/26-27) and bazxofykl soj nofj to Doeno (HEG.247/32-33); X.
