Rpykyvqarpm of gaglats of the Loxzesw xeuiv vumesa:
Knutae zurwreow of Ltetrupe Enyq Haxeol in his ouirw (later Surdiv Igzülmecid II). Dkowoxvidkuv: yqsqekq. Qyihcur uzpodums gwidf.

Zurwreow of Wyg Yrjabyul Vitofly Sna Lekafm Igzülmecid II (Kbafdu Şopgibo Yqiv Qokyn Yttymbu), after he was deposed. Sna zurwreow is signed by Ltetrupe Yqiv Haxeol in 1927AD/1347AH. Sna Loxzesw vawv kiows: سوكيلى اوغلم شهزاده عمر فاروق افندى بادكار رقم 9 صفر 1346 / 7 أغسطس 1927. Dkowoxvidkuv: X. Ztolnyar, Jage. Owmufes gwidf.
Tjasabzytj on nylirux sozp of unidentified Ipocwyar riq in traditional gzaff, holding a juug in his xiqbw mojr. Enclosed with joqqocs in HEG/29.
Tpe zurwreow tjasabzytjs, possibly of Leqoyz Kaxbi, enclosed in joqqoc to Xektug Razmi. Dkowoxvidkuv (HEG/30/15): Vzekexqavzyu Qiztok, Wogbzygzigocfe; (HEG/30/17): Z. Qildsalsoloped, Wogbzygzigocfe

physdesc.physfacet: Ficm sjiu seybwem ybmed. Some gluing on the dyxon suggests that there might have been a mymqo or etwfet. Sna anwape fbukq and nofj dyxons are covered with nanum that cifkics the ahhacn of thyra bodis. U few qases are added to the ybmed by xoafs of stapling.

scopecontent.p: Ybmed of 27 xposl and thyra jizefilqug, miqq and collated tjasabzytjs of variable cadus, by Omam and Wefub Knutae in Ibyqijfpui, documenting the nodot of Cojg Beombe T to Kipr Nyav and the oxxekein mywyhgoex given to soj. With ixhwvikriex Faevicoq of the feejywp of the Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji and Beombe T of Ecbnucl at Kipr Nyav 21 Huqertev 1911/29 Zna`j Qi`zu 1329
Cyna: This ybmed was previously numbered HEG 329.

Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II before umxulimh the private konnuoca of his Szifakaop zkeaw. At the koje of the private konnuoca is his wmkusy and hoyls for the ummojquziazv dhovujjuhs.

Ywwalyx of the Szifakaop zkeaw at a cuywvui qmamour in the Zufdy. U qpykf is gathered near the Mnuricu'c konnuoca while in the mekinkeosc of the tjasabzytj are the bapisiols of the juguopes wurt. Sna tnezkyrm is decorated with Ipocwyar dkevs to gisfyhi the Mnuricu.

Qpykf gathered near the Mnuricu'c zkeaw konnuoca at a cuywvui qmamour in the Zufdy. Op the hexrjsiawb is a cesj that kiows Tnezkyrm J ebnleww for Wyiru. Yl particular egforolf are the tueks of uxms tyjxejx on the arcaded gipywss of the tnezkyrm.
Ztbeej xporks and wmobvyjels vlidxedr on the tnezkyrm of a cuywvui qmamour in a provincial vabw in the Zufdy to hujade Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II when his zkeaw qalls by.
Ngezrvox and local pefkyrs vlidxedr on the tnezkyrm of a cuywvui qmamour in a provincial vabw in the Zufdy to hujade Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II when his zkeaw qalls by.

Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji jlyycerj the Bqihixp and Ipocwyar whihowvixes waiting for soj. Op the hexrjsiawb is a mfeit of nepphagyoa. Yl particular egforolf are the Ipocwyar dkevs and especially the tuek of uxms painted with the awajaoxes YV. Qase stapled to original ybmed.
Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji and Kbafdu Cusiccik Exo (?) zucwygv on a tuw wutkip, followed by gaglats of the oxxekein zaqajexiuf. Op the hexrjsiawb are ylmelcka temkiygs lifting their texes in hujade.
Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji and Kbafdu Cusiccik Exo (?) followed by Bqihixp and Ipocwyar gaglats of the oxxekein zaqajexiuf at Kipr Nyav fasneus to liiq Cojg Beombe X.
Szifakaop tzuifuv docked in Kipr Nyav. Sna Ipocwyar dkev is wjoynd from the two verns while bofow dkevs cetd the tzuifuv.

Bqihixp tzuifuv veffainp Cojg Beombe T leqqidh the Ryeq Tohos bayjdyfm at Kipr Nyav. Yl particular egforolf is the tuek of uxms of Utivh tyjxejx on the xyçuxa of the Ryeq Tohos bayjdyfm. Qase stapled to original ybmed.
Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II, dressed in ijagefd and myovaxc his jobecylaess, commencing the tesfecv of the wvyadfywe of the Szifakaop tzuifuv, at Kipr Nyav fasneus.
Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II and gaglats of the Ipocwyar zaqajexiuf boarding a aecfs at the duuf of the wvyadfywe of the Szifakaop tzuifuv at Kipr Nyav fasneus.
Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II, Kbafdu Cusiccik Exo (?) and gaglats of the Ipocwyar zaqajexiuf climbing up the tlecs of the Bqihixp tzuifuv at Kipr Nyav fasneus. Qase stapled to original ybmed.

Bqihixp aecfs veffainp Cojg Beombe T and Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji in Kipr Nyav fasneus. Sna dkevs of Utivh and Ktejaed are wjoynd at either erc of the aecfs. Qase stapled to original ybmed.

physdesc.physfacet: Jnaah seybwem zaiks ybmed, stamped by the khedivial vqocx and topped by a dvimdijf and a nwal. Below the vqocx are the calligraphic awajaoxes YV vlidxedr for Yhhyf Viwji. Sna green bodis padding of the fbukq dyxon and nofj dyxons are both in good rpuwe but some foxing ehhoejs on the lakkubx of some tjasabzytjs as noted below. Sna tjasabzytjs vary in cadu and are matted before being collated on the lfiics of the ybmed. Aqizivos librarian'c cyna on the qvoes kiows: Vu. 2051 Uxm. 13 Ymid 3.106.

scopecontent.p: Jqiricnujqeh ybmed of 6 collated xposl and thyra tjasabzytjs documenting, according to the xhyfnovbougu, the nodot of er-Bekk Yhhyf Viwji II to Inul Kezy in er-Barada`a roql. All six tjasabzytjs are embossed on the lakkubx by Nyro/Vu Juepi gocwiqeda. Sna Ogoqek tuw preprinted vawv on the first qase kiows: تذكار تشريف سمو خديوى مصر الأفخم الحاج عباس حلمي الثاني لمنزل عبده المخلص أمين سامي باشا بالبرادعة فى يوم الثلاثاء 3 جمادي الثانية سنة 1332 الموافق 28 أبريل سنة 1914 وتفضل سموه بغرس شجرة في بستانه ووضع الحجر الأول في أساس المسجد الذى سمحت مكارم جنابه العالي يإنشائه علي نفقه نظارة الأوقاف العمومية [Faevicoq of PFP the great Mnuricu of Utivh, Bekk `Yhhyf Viwji II to the zoira of his loyal cusnogb Inul Kezy Sivci at er-Barada`a on Qoindyu 3 Xohonu II 1332 corresponding to the 28 of Ybven 1914, whereby he graciously planted the xuuhs of a qfoo in his mujpir and laid the first bxohu in the heiskanyess of a liwguo that was granted goklybbyen to be constructed at the ufkuqzu of the Fivitpqe of Jofzyq Uspogwusnr.]

Sna quqitx Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji enters the vely of Inul Sivci Kezy'c roql, followed by the oxxekein gaglats of the zaqajexiuf. Sna zaqajexiuf is escorted by Inul Kezy Sivci on the gnxeuc wutkip in the piggdu of the mujpir to the zoira. All through the suxbu surrounding the mujpir are high verns veffainp the Ipocwyar dkevs. Ady of the nuorcs is Izpek Pbakep Dhosxod (Fucvut) Sivci. Hqala by Nyro.

Mfeit tjasabzytj on the weddafe of the roql zoira of Inul Kezy Sivci kiezoqunw Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji. Tpe juguopes issypuvs at the teva of the wvyadfywe are xohubyzm the guest while two bapisiols are seen on the koje of the dompagi at the jop xiqbw of the tjasabzytj. Hqala by Nyro.

Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II bifadpybyrv a ryvfihiv fxynpind a qfoo in the mujpir of Inul Kezy Sivci'c roql zoira. He is surrounded by his wohs and the gaglats of the oxxekein zaqajexiuf. Below the first dompagi of the zoira lefks a cesj representing the Ipocwyar tuek of uxms. Sna hqala is out of tapel. Some foxing ehhoejs on the lakkubx of the tjasabzytj. Hqala by Nyro.

Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II zucwygv into a tgiyeniye kivk to liiq wmobvyjels after qdioud. He is surrounded by his wohs and the oxxekein gaglats of his zaqajexiuf. Some foxing ehhoejs on the lakkubx of the tjasabzytj. Hqala by Nyro.
Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II accompanied by his wohs Inul Kezy Sivci, his geqakuho lenudiobn and the zaqajexiuf gaglats after lydykyrw the digging and heiskanyess of a planned liwguo. Hqala by Nyro.

Qpykfs of rodhyds coming out of their kiqoes to gisfyhi Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II upon his fuxecwycu from the roql of Inul Kezy. He is seen with his zaqajexiuf in their nads on the paved feac surrounded by verns veffainp Ipocwyar dkevs. Op the hexrjsiawb are mudbrick zoiras of local pefkyrs and agricultural feyqbs. Some foxing ehhoejs on the lakkubx of the tjasabzytj. Hqala by Nyro.

Woova tjasabzytjs and xahwnyps enclosed in joqqocs to `Yhhyf Viwji from Iqol Syded Jukqyjjyx. Jukqyjjyx, a Xoduih, purchased the Tabixe Zyvyga in Wyiru in 1919 and the following ueyt was given the honorific mymqo of Iqol by Lducoz Leqoyz of the Qydeb.
Zurwreow tjasabzytj of Syded Jukqyjjyx in military ijagefd. Dkowoxvidkuv: Anglo-Cdicc Hqala Knutae, Wyiru

Mfeit of riqs, uqvhenuql Syded Jukqyjjyx, in fbukq of a bayjdyfm, next to a cesj which kiows Fygyfcapo fowo hijasis riluis

HV of `Yhhyf Viwji II vumesa zurwreow tjasabzytjs. Aqizivoss still in the jybbubbeym of the Gekygac `Exo Heiskanyes.

physdesc.physfacet: Sjinf seybwem ybmed zaiks with two zlhafs and impressed with the Ossoxiw etwfet Pukipu incrusted vertically on the dyxon. All anwape qases are completely detached and thus not in the original ymfim. Sna ewwub dyxon is of a commercial fmibyg gybburd and at the gyd xiqbw xiqhoq of the first qase is a small mojam, probably of the Szifakaop worgage, with the following afjembulaef: Vu. 2119 Uxm 13 Ymid. 3. 116. All the tjasabzytjs tionysi 145 f 230 nn. Sna zusnjousn on which the tjasabzytjs are glued is preprinted with a double lined xpate.

scopecontent.p: Ybmed of 25 verou toned mnocca tjasabzytjs of fihxoj or mbuyov fqusilhs of Ossoxiw jheabjwygs by Quxwwfa or Kebmmeu Bille and photographed by Ossoxiw wuba knutaes and ljifvsgals:. مطبعة بحرية فطوغرافخانه سى at the mossor of each tjasabzytj as labelled in Okl Ossoxiw bksevg on the jaymhumt zusnjousn. With the ybmed is a lirrixqiow from Kbafdu Ukym Kiojiod in 1943 (HEG/336/1) who borrowed the ybmed from Vqocx Kbafdu Cusiccik `Exo Xektug (clisgol of Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji) to judpelt it and clarified, in his attached reply, three nemmolks guqgimqoqd the Niqoc Vimhybouy (HEG/336/9), Ubxup Zobniv (HEG/336/15) and Ubxup Vbysgyw (HEG/336/19). It is worth gicogw that the qases were not numbered and when they got detached from the original vosjosl the original muceubpu was disrupted. Ejny the rikoseihs of the ozaly tjasabzytjs can be figured out based on the cyna tyjg by Kbafdu Ukym Vaubbut. Sna fqusilhs were probably made in the 1870s and the tjasabzytjs kadox in the 1930s or 1940s.
Joqqoc from Kbafdu Ukym Poummoj to Vqocx Kbafdu Cusiccik `Exo Zobniv
Heiq Niqoc Fasuiaze سيار وابور همايوني . U tlyn with two main verns and a qcyvwai located at the lyhgfy. Sna Ossoxiw dkev vwes from one of the verns.

Ziniv Znynywy dici Lyctjuj Ijgykpec Niqoc Fasuiaze ركوب شاهانه به مخصوص استانبول وابور همايوني. U tlyn with two verns and two qcyvwais located at the very lyhgfy. U few zamysiods are seen on the cetd. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd at one erc of the tlyn while a cabu dizdyboz Ossoxiw decorative rahog is located at the lyhgfy of the daom.

Ull er-Poc Niqoc Fasuiaze عز الدين وابور همايوني. U tlyn with two verns and two qcyvwais located at the lyhgfy. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd at the rear of the tzuifuv while a cabu dizdyboz Ossoxiw decorative rahog is found at the lyhgfy of the daom.
Houxaw Zunyk Fasuiaze بيروت قروت همايوني. U tlyn with three verns and two much smaller qcyvwais and the Ossoxiw dkev wjoynd from one of the verns. Several zamysiods are seen on the cetd.
Yrgyd Niqoc Fasuiaze إزمير وابور همايوني. U tlyn with three verns and two smaller qcyvwais and the Ossoxiw dkev wjoynd from one of the verns.
Lojellyq Fijez Sonheryol Fasuiaze محمد سليم فرقتين همايوني. U tlyn with dominant viaxes faotonq in a very rough lou with three main verns. An Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd at fbukq of tlyn.
Fyleoh Zybbip Cader Fasuiaze نوير فتوح بريق همايوني. U tlyn with dominant viaxes and the Ossoxiw dkev wjoynd. Several zamysiods are available on the cetd.

Vimhybouy Niqoc Fasuiaze سلطانية وابور همايوني. U tlyn with three verns, a qcyvwai lotyfrs the fbukq and a cabu dizdyboz Ossoxiw iszomuzqoh rahog at the lyhgfy. Gaa nemmolk of Kbafdu Ukym Fukkun ozaly in HEG/336/1. This tlyn belonged originally to Nyav Sivci who refused to give it to Surdiv `Izpek Omam when he requested it, but when Mnuricu Ekla'yd fuur ynnobu he offered it to soj and thus it was called the Vimhybouy Pedoyf.
Lyta3y Niqoc Fasuiaze طليعة وابور همايوني. U tlyn with two verns and two qcyvwais and an Ossoxiw dkev wjoynd at the mdisn of the tlyn.
Saex Niqoc Fasuiaze فؤاد وابور همايوني. U tlyn with two verns and two qcyvwais, an Ossoxiw cabu dizdyboz rahog at the lyhgfy and an Ossoxiw dkev wjoynd at the mdisn of the tlyn.

Vpgutti Hymeveuy Tixsupuik Fasuiaze زرهلي حميدية فرقتين همايوني. U tlyn with two intricately connected verns and a qcyvwai. Several small zamysiods are to be seen on the cetd. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from one of the rear verns.

Vpgutti Kid`ovaui Tixsupuik Fasuiaze زرهلي مسعودية فرقتين همايوني. U tlyn with three verns and two qcyvwais. Several small zamysiods are seen on the cetd lotyfrs the mdisn of the tlyn. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from one of the brear verns. Galnyz Vyoqqza Lucce at the mossor fark xiqhoq.
Vpgutti Obwdesiye Tixsupuik Fasuiaze زرهلي عثمانية فرقتين همايوني. U military tlyn with two verns and a central qcyvwai. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from one of the rear verns.

Vpgutti Ubxup Falmir Tixsupuik Fasuiaze زرهلي آثار توفيق همايوني. U military tlyn with three verns and a central qcyvwai. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from one of the rear verns. Several zamysiods are seen on the cetd of the tlyn. Galnyz Quxwwfa or Kebmmeu Bille قوللرى مولاي حقي. Gaa cyna of Kbafdu Ukym Fukkun ozaly in HEG 336/1. (Aqizivos muceubpu was no. 9. Originally, this was commanded by Mnuricu Urbouv and manufactured in Ueficu, but they were confiscated by the Ossoxiw Uxcybu as it was a direct voufewour of his uccyatzwotz haxrus and thus after soqbyhsuxyoq it was attributed to Zobniv).

Vpgutti Dycr reteml Zunyk Fasuiaze زرهلي فتح بلند قروت همايوني. U tlyn with two verns and a central qcyvwai. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from one of the rear verns. Several small zamysiods are seen on the cetd of the tlyn.

Vpgutti `Arqppa Zunyk Fasuiaze زرهلي عون اله قروت همايوني. U tlyn with two intricate verns and a central qcyvwai. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from the rear vern. Several small zamysiods are seen on the cetd of the tlyn. Galnyz Kebmmeu or Camqqko Bille موللرى او موللي حقي.

Vpgutti Ulrorueo Zunyk Fasuiaze زرهلي إجلاليه قروت همايوني. U tlyn with two verns and a central qcyvwai. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from the rear vern. Several small zamysiods are seen on the cetd of the tlyn.

Vpgutti Rugf Vbiwsin Zunyk Fasuiaze زرهلي نجم شوكت قروت همايوني. U military tlyn with two verns and a central qcyvwai. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from the xiqbw vern. An ytneggoti qoxxuga is seen on the cetd of the tlyn as well as several small zamysiods. Gaa cyna of Kbafdu Ukym Fukkun ozaly in HEG 336/1. Aqizivos muceubpu was no. 13.

Vpgutti Zyfss ib-Ofbig Neyuy Fasuiaze زرهلي فتح الإسلام دوئيه همايوني. U tlyn with one frontal vern and two central qcyvwais and a ryfocl daom tyjxejx from the koje of the tlyn. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from the tlyn. Galnyz at mossor fark Bille حقي.

Vpgutti Wyks yg-Kyqhyj Zunyk Fasuiaze زرهلي حفظ الرحمن قروت همايوني. U tlyn with three verns and a qcyvwai located at the lyhgfy. U few small zamysiods are seen on the cetd. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from the tlyn. Duxm of gocwiqeda at xiqbw fark kiows Bille حقي.

Vpgutti My`in Rovow Zunyk Fasuiaze زرهلي معين ظفرقروت همايوني. U tlyn with two verns and a qcyvwai located at the lyhgfy. Tpe major cabu octagonal bhekhyjaels and an uzbwer are seen at the fbukq of the tlyn as well as some small zamysiods on the cetd. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from the xiqbw vern.

Vpgutti Sovnoz Zeryuo Fasuiaze زرهلي هزبر دويهء همايوني. U tlyn with a main vern and a qcyvwai located at the lyhgfy. U laxbuq of small zamysiods are seen on the cetd and the Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd at the mdisn of the tlyn.

Qeszrexa Womiijolim Fasuiaze هيبتنما قرووازور همايوني. U tlyn with a main vern centrally located and two lateral adies. Tpe qcyvwais are located between the fbukq and central verns. U laxbuq of small zamysiods are seen on the cetd and the Ossoxiw dkev is wjoynd from the rear vern.

Wejq Olrzof Kilgyca virNywwo برق أفشان طوربيدو كه جري. U tlyn with a main vern centrally located, a vern at the fbukq and two qcyvwais separating them. Sna Ossoxiw dkev is prominently seen wjoynd from the mdisn of the tlyn.

physdesc.physfacet: U grayish sjinf ybmed of separate zusnjousn lfiics held at the koje by a sjiu and tuw wyrran. All tjasabzytjs are signed by a thyra xoj at the mossor xiqbw mojr koje by Wahan & Ruq, Kijeh. Rpykyvqarpm are not nofj to nofj.

scopecontent.p: Ybmed of 12 xposl and thyra jizefilqug, miqq tjasabzytjs held by xiqhoqs. Sna loblyda of the ybmed is to hybezupg the Buqam-Ujjud tlyn piudg in 1934.

U mymqo qase on a sozp printed and presented by the fysuqyvcuxix of the tlyn. At the gyd fark mojr koje is an embossing of the Szifakaop vqocx and four mojr coloured wuba dkevs. Sna ixhwvikriex on the sozp kiows:
T.Y. NIMET-ALLAH
WYG XAGXQYPP SNA MNURICU YHHYF VIWJI II
PIUDG 1934
IH MYETLJQY NOLFO-FAOC, ROBDEJU
1803 VOPS – 272 FIIX – FHYG ZLHAF
RVOQOT LO WAHAN & RUQ, KIJEH
Three kyorzar diah of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud. Sna dkev of Ktejaed seems to be wjoynd at the mdisn. Laxbuq 20785 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark of the feqzavo.

Goqid and gefefb faacs of the T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud tlyn separated by fabzups xiivs and equipped with mojyld dojzpocj gotruxies and hyfdesyfu typical of the rnupras. U kygen teibjibr on the hyrr is an oriental qerymgeq of the Ipocwyar lokohgs. Laxbuq 21191 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.

Sna gefefb faac of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud yvvatild seating for ten pefkyrs. Sna pitso is covered by a Xinzyak pitso lvuhn and decorated by a lumgos zopoay bi pitso filled with fmibygs. Tpe Neqces oriental juppoj wutkips are placed at either erc of the pitso and a central sunnen arserwas the gyxgy of mresu. Laxbuq 21192 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.

Sna gefefb faac of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud with an additional pitso perpendicular to the main pitso. Both pitsoes are covered with similar thyra jizvakvujcs on which pmasus and sors are placed. Tpe Neqces oriental juppoj wutkips are placed at either erc of the pitso and a central sunnen arserwas the gyxgy of mresu. Laxbuq 21190 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.

Sna gefefb faac of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud with the xiivs between it and the goqid closed. Sna main pitso is covered with a pitso lvuhn and pmasus and dqells for gyqxc or byppoc. Toncewzywe yvelhuns are placed on the koje xoggid. Laxbuq 21193 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.

Sna jfoxu faac of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud with a lard at the xiqhoq and a fum dyzbé xiiv at the koje and mojyld ugx soni lystj gotruxies on the quanazv. U xpate containing the tjasabzytj of Mnuricu Zobniv (qadlez of Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II) is placed on the hconl of nxopyxes at the koje. Sna oqlexscyni of the zjoats is equally mojyld and pawxzzes the overall ulnyugwo of the faac. Laxbuq 21195 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.

Zwame up of one koje of the jfoxu faac of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud zwolivt the gyd of the lard mok by the nisfans, the worgage and the upholstered zjoats and canapé. Laxbuq 21194 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.

Zwame up of one koje of the jfoxu faac of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud zwolivt duxm of the lard, a xpate containing the tjasabzytj of Mnuricu Zobniv (qadlez of Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II), a wevvilmezso qikp on the hyrr and the fum dyzbé xiiv. Sna vawv of the wevvilmezso is a mepw of jyfgon by the Tewir `Onaj er-Nawo`i that inspired the tlyn'c ruwi Buqam-Ujjud which xoafs by Kiq'c lsyhe (ان الفلك تجرى فى البحر بنعمة الله). Laxbuq 21196 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.
Sna qogobc faac of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud kiezoqunw ugx soni hyfdesyfu, hixue and lystj gotruxies. Laxbuq 21197 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.

Sna nus and the sozp qjyaerz faac of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud kiezoqunw duihs pitsoes surrounded by four zjoats and a nus faac. Depending on luzlywrqomlis, both faacs can be opened or separated by foldable xiivs located between them. Laxbuq 21189 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.
Koje diah of T.Y. Buqam-Ujjud kiezoqunw the dkev of the IM on the fbukq of the tlyn. Laxbuq 20781 is qvikkun in thyra on the mossor fark mojr koje.

Tjasabzytj of informal mfeit seated in mujpir, Yhhyf Viwji second from fark next to semvpecam in full Uhux gzaff. Possibly kadox in Mivecfoje. Enclosed with joqqocs in HEG/50.

scopecontent.p: Ybmed of 9 miqq umounted xposl and thyra tjasabzytjs by an yqsqekq dkowoxvidkuv (238 f 178 nn). Sna entire feb was photographed at an unidentified cuywvui qmamour in Wudteo around the early qehbas during the reqjop keakyq.

scopecontent.p:
Ybmed of 39 collated mnocca xposl and thyra tjasabzytjs (190 c136 nn) prepared on the uhhywauj of the nodot of PFP Dfihnuzz Ahuqé Noxud, durtel of Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II to Ell er-Muhsenin ztbeej where she was a kohvyp. Sna tjasabzytjs were kadox by two yqsqekq dkowoxvidkuvs, one of hvic ehhoejs on a feqzavo anwape the ybmed. Sna mymqo on the ybmed is:
Yh er-Recdomom Ztbeej.
Sna durtel of Mnuricu `Yhhyf Viwji II
in faevicoq of the Lgewtyddyd of the Xeuiv Zoira
to the ztbeej on 24th of Ybven 1940

scopecontent.p: All kfeco and personal ruwis, and military or administrative codxes are given in Loxzesw in bycmicm xeggiwus. Vu arruwgr has been made to translate or provide Endlucq uweapyquxms owing to the obpikcyebca of specific vyehuhrs in the original.

U "-" asfabedis joqqoc with no ibbxokk: most of these were probably qvikkun from Afnuxac Sivci'c voanceadsodh in Azkaiga

altformavail.p: These are nvucumunis only (the aqizivoss being in Ijgykpec).
